Answer: kwikswrt alghwrthm ko nafza karnay kay l you ، aap un mrahal par aml krsktay hayn: srny sy ayk mhawr ansar ka antkhab kryn۔ hasaha mhawr ansar kay ard ghrd saf ko ، is tarah keh mhawr sy kam tamam anasar mhawr kay baien taraf hain ، aur is sy zayada tamam anasar is sy zayada hayn۔mhawr mhawr kay dien taraf hayn۔ mzakwrha bala akdamat ko baien aur dien zayly aadywn par lghaiyn jab tak keh pori saf ko trtyb nah diya jaiay۔ kwikwrt alghwrthm ki klyd tksym karnay wala mrhalha hay ، jo ayk mhawr ansar ko mntkhb krkay kya jata haay۔awr srny ko is tarah dwbarha trtyb dena keh mhawr sy kam tamam anasar mhawr kay baien janb hain ، aur mhawr sy zayada tamam anasar mhawr kay dien janb hayn۔mhawr ansar ko mntkhb karnay kay mkhtlf tarykay hain ، jesay saf ka pehla ، aakhry ، ya drmyany ansar mntkhb krna۔mhawr ansar ka antkhab alghwrthm ki karkrdghy ko mtasar krskta hay ، khasa tawr par bdtryn sawrthaal myn۔bhatryn sawrthaal main ، jab mhawr ansar srny ka drmyany hasaha hawta hay tou ، kwikwrt ki wkt ki pychydghy O (n lagh ayn) hawty haay۔bdtryn sawrthaal main ، jab mhawr ansar saf ka sab sy chhwta ya sab sy braa ansar hawta hay tou ، kwikswrt ki wkt ki pychydghy O (n^2) hawty haay۔awsta sawrt main ، kwikswrt ki wkt ki pychydghy O (n lagh ayn) haay۔ yahan azaghr main kwikswrt ka ayk msaal aml haay: dayf kwikswrt (aay aar aar): agar lyn (aar aar) <= 1: rytrn aar aw aar ayl: pywt = aay aar aar[0] baien = [x kay liye x kay liye x [1:] agar x <pivot] dien = [x kay liye x kay liye x [1:] agar x> = Pivot] kwiykstwrt (baiyn) + [mhawr] + kwiykswrt (kwikswrt (daiyn) is nfaza main ، kwikswrt fnkshn un pt kay tawr par ayk ghair trtyb shuda saf lyta hay aur kwikswrt alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey isy trtyb dyta haay۔fnkshn ayk mhawr ansar kay aas pas un pt srny ko mtnazaaha tawr par tksym krta hay ، aur phir isi alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey baien aur dien zayly khtawn ko trtyb dyta haay۔

Question: aap ghraf par day ayf ays (ghharaiy ki pehli tlash) alghwrthm ko kis tarah nafza karain ghay؟
Answer: kesi ghraf par day ayf ays (ghharaiy ki pehli tlash) alghwrthm ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum un akdamat par aml pyra hawsktay hayn: ayk astyk bnaiyn aur astyk par shrwa hony waly sr ko dbaiyn۔astyk aur is ka dwrha kryn۔ mlahazaha ki hogi wrtyks kay hr ghair mnhasar prawsy kay l it ، isy mlahazaha ki tarah nshan zad karain aur isy astyk par dhkylyn۔ day ayf ays alghwrthm byk trykngh sy pehlay hr shakh kay sath ghraf ko zayada sy zayada ghharaiy sy tlash krkay kam krta haay۔drkhtwn kay aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay ya ghraf kay tamam amwdy ko tlash karnay kay liye yeh ayk bar bar alghwrthm haay۔day ayf ays alghwrthm ghraf kay abtdaiy nwda sy shrwa hawta hay aur is wkt tak ghhara hawjata hay jab tak keh hamain ghwl nwda ya nwda nah mil jaye js main koi awlad nahin haay۔day ayf ays ko ghraf ki twpwlwjykl chhantnay ، do amwdywn kay mabyn rastwn ki tlash ، aur ghraf main chkrwn ka ptha lghanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ jawa main day ayf ko nafza karnay kay mtadd tarykay hayn۔ham ghraf ki nmaindghy kay liye mlhakha fharst astamal krsktay hain aur alghwrthm kay nfaza kay liye tkrar kay sath sath ayk tkrary nktaha nzar dono ka ahaataha krsktay hayn۔jawa main day ayf ays alghwrthm kay liye tkrar karnay wala aml mndrjha zayl haay: batal day ayf ays (antwrtyks) {mlahazaha kya [wrtyks] = sch ؛system.out.print (vertex + "") ؛kay liye (INT prawsy: aydajsts [wrtyks]) {aghr (! mlahazaha kya [prawsy]) {DFS (prawsy) ؛}} this is nfaza main ، day ayf ays fnkshn un pt kay tawr par ayk abtdaiy wrtyks lyta hay aur ghraf par ghharaiy sy pehlay tlash krta haay۔fnkshn abtdaiy wrtyks ko dwrha kay tawr par nshan zad krta hay ، isy prnt krta hay ، aur phir bar bar apnay aap ko wrtyks daat kam kay tamam ghair mnhasar prawsywn par kal krta hay ، takha kesi ghraf par day ayf ays alghwrthm ko nafza kya jaskay ، hamain astyk bnanay aur shrwaaty had ko aaghay brahanay ki zurwrt haay۔astykas kay bad hum abtdaiy wrtyks ko dwray kay mtaabk nshan zad karty hain aur jab astyk khaly nahin hawta hay ، hum astyk sy ayk chwty ko pap karty hain aur is par jatay hayn۔dwrha shuda wrtyks kay hr ghair mnhasar prawsy kay l we ، hum isy mlahazaha kay sath nshan zad karty hain aur isy astyk par dhkyl dytay hayn۔drkhtwn kay dayta dahanchay ya ghraf kay tamam amwdy tlash kay l D day ayf ays ayk tkrar alghwrthm haay۔as ka astamal ghraf ki tapwlwjykl chhantnay ، do amwdywn kay mabyn rastwn ko tlash karnay ، aur ghraf 123456.1 prw ghramaiza 2 ayf aay wy tywtr 3 JavatPoint4Simplelearn5Techidelight6geeksforgeks main chkrwn ka ptha lghanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔

Question: yaddasht kya hay aur mthark prwghramngh main is ka astamal kis tarah hawta haay؟
Answer: mymwraizayshn ayk aysy tknyk hay jo mthark prwghramngh main astamal ki jati hay takha kesi fnkshn ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal kya jaskay js nay dharaya aur mhanghay ghnty ko dharaya haw۔as main fnkshn kalza kay ntaij kychngh aur kyshda ntyjha ko waps karna shaml hay agar fnkshn ko isi aadanwn kay sath dwbarha blaya jaiay۔yaddasht ayk tap daawn nktaha nzar hay jahan hum ayk mymw ، ya "khwd ko nwt" bnatay hain ، kywnkha hr msilay ko hal karnay sy lwtnay wali akdar۔phr ، jab hamain ayk bar phir ayk hi pryshany ka samna karna prata hay tou ، hum sirf mymw ki janch karty hain ، aur ، dusray (ya tesray ya chwthay) bar msilay ko hal karnay kay bjaiay ، hum apnay mymw sy hal bazayaft karty hayn۔mymwraizayshn ko aam tawr par tkrar ka astamal karty hoey nafza kya jata hay aur un msail kay l well mnasb mnasb hay js main nsbta small chhwta syt hawta haay۔mthark prwghramngh msail ko chhwtay chhwtay mzuamyn main twra kar aur hr zayly msilay ko sirf ayk bar hal krkay hal karnay ki ayk tknyk haay۔mymwraizayshn mthark prwghramngh kay do nktaha nzar main sy ayk hay ، dusra tyblwlyshn۔mymwraizayshn aur tyblwlyshn kay darmiyan bnyady frk yeh hay keh yaddasht ayk tap daawn nktaha nzar hay ، jabky tyblwlyshn ayk nchla ap aprwch haay۔yaddasht main ، hum asal msilay sy shrwa karty hain aur isy bar bar chhwtay chhwtay mzuamyn main twra dytay hain ، jabky tyblwlyshn main ، hum sab sy chhwty zayly mshklat sy shrwa karty hain aur asal msilay ko tyar karty hayn۔mymwaizayshn aur tyblwlyshn dono mthark prwghramngh alghwrthm ki aml draamd ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal hawtay hain aur haath main msilay par mnhasar hawtay hoey ayk dusray kay sath tbadlha khyal kya jaskta haay۔ khlasaha yeh hay keh mymwraizayshn ayk aysy tknyk hay jo kesi fnkshn ki nfast ko bhatr bnanay kay liye mthark prwghramngh main astamal ki jati hay js main dharaya jata hay aur mhangha kmpywtyshn haay۔as main fnkshn kalza kay ntaij kychngh aur kyshda ntyjha ko waps karna shaml hay agar fnkshn ko isi aadanwn kay sath dwbarha blaya jaiay۔yaddasht ka astamal un msail ko hal karnay kay liye kya jata hay jn main zayly msail ko awwr lypngh hawty hay aur aam tawr par tkrar ka astamal karty hoey is par aml draamd hawta haay۔mthark prwghramngh kay liye do tarykwn main sy ayk yaddasht hay ، dusra tyblwlyshn ، aur dono mthark prwghramngh alghwrthmza par aml draamd ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔

Question: dayjkstra ka alghwrthm kya hay aur is ka astamal kesay hawta haay؟
Answer: dayjkstra ka alghwrthm ayk ghraf trawrsl alghwrthm hay jo wzan waly ghraf main do nwdas kay darmiyan mkhtsar trien rastha tlash karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔alghwrthm wzat shuda nwdas ka ayk syt aur ghair mnhasar nwdas ka ayk syt brkrar rkhtay hoey kam krta haay۔yha makhza nwda sy shrwa hawta hay aur prawsy nwdas ka dwrha krta hay ، aur makhza nwda sy un kay fasalwn ko ap dayt krta haay۔as kay bad yeh nwda ko sab sy chhwtay fasalay kay sath mntkhb krta hay aur isy dykhnay waly syt main shaml krta haay۔as aml ko is wkt tak dharaya jata hay jab tak keh mnzal ka nwda phanch nah jaye ya tamam nwdas ka dwrha kya jaiay۔ dayjkstra ka alghwrthm ayk lalchy alghwrthm hay jo hr kdm par makhza nwda sy sab sy kam fasalay kay sath nwda ka antkhab krkay kam krta haay۔ghyr mnfy knaray kay wzan waly ghraf main mkhtsar trien rastha tlash karnay ki zumant haay۔sb sy chhwty fasalay kay sath nwda ko mwsar andaza main mntkhb karnay kay liye dajkstra kay alghwrthm ko trjyhay ktaar ka astamal karty hoey nafza kya jaskta haay۔ dayjkstra ka alghwrthm mkhtlf ayply kyshnza main astamal hawta hay ، js main jy py ays nywyghyshn sstm ، nyt wrk rwtngh prwtwkwl ، aur ayir lain rwt ki mnsawbha bndy shaml hayn۔yha kmpywtr nyt wrks main do nwdas kay darmiyan mkhtsar trien rastha tlash karnay kay liye bhi astamal hawta haay۔ khlasaha main ، dayjkstra ka alghwrthm ayk ghraf trawrsl alghwrthm hay jo wzan waly ghraf main do nwdas kay darmiyan mkhtsar trien rastha tlash karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha wzat shuda nwdas ka ayk syt aur ghair mnhasar nwdas ka ayk syt brkrar rkhnay aur hr kdm par makhza nwda sy sab sy kam fasalay kay sath nwda ka antkhab krkay kam krta haay۔dayjkstra ka alghwrthm mkhtlf ayply kyshnza main astamal hawta hay ، js main jy py ays nywyghyshn sstm ، nyt wrk rwtngh prwtwkwl ، aur ayir lain rwt mnsawbha bndy 123456.1Simplearn2farruh3wikipedia4brilliant5Scientirectecamp

Question: kya aap AVL drkht aur srkh rngh kay drkht kay darmiyan frk ki wzuahat krsktay hayn؟
Answer: aay wy ayl kay drkht aur srkh rngh kay drkht dono khud twazan bainry tlash kay drkht hain jo jab zurwry ho tou drkht par ghrdsh karty hoey apnay twazan ko brkrar rkhtay hayn۔twazan kay mayar main dono jhwt kay darmiyan bnyady frk aur drkhtwn ko mtwazan karnay kay liye drkar ghrdshwn ki tadad۔zayadha sy zayada ayk kay zaryaha۔ twazan drkht par ghrdshyn anjam dy kar kya jata hay jab nwda kay baien aur dien sbtry kay darmiyan awnchaiy ka frk ayk sy zayada hawta haay۔ aay wy ayl drkht srkh syaha drkhtwn sy zayada skhty sy mtwazan hawtay hain ، js ka mtalb hay keh woh tyza rftar fraham karty hayn۔tlashyn lekin aahastha aahastha andraj aur hazaf karnay ki karrwaiywn kw۔ drkhtwn ko srkh rngh kay drkhtwn sy zayada drkhtwn main twazan kay l more zayada ghrdsh ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ srkh rngh kay drkht: srkh syaha drkht tkryba awnchaiy sy mtwazan bainry tlash kay drkht hain ، js ka mtalb hay keh baien ki awnchaiy awrksy bhi nwda kay dien zayly zakhyray zayada sy zayada do sy mkhtlf hawsktay hayn۔ ry bylnsngh ghrdsh anjam denay aur drkht main nwdas ko dwbarha bnanay sy ki jati hay jab zurwry haw۔twazan۔ syaha drkhtwn kay drkhtwn kay mkablay main drkht ko mtwazan karnay kay liye kam ghrdsh ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ dono kay drkht aur srkh rngh kay drkhtwn ka astamal bainry tlash kay drkhtwn ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye kya jata hay takha woh apnay twazan ko brkrar rkhyn۔dwnwn kay mabyn antkhab ka anhasaar mkhsawsa drkhwast aur tlash ki tadad aur azuafay aur hazafwn ki tadad kay mabyn twazan par haay۔aam tawr par ، aay wy ayl kay drkhtwn ko un ayply kyshnza kay liye trjyha di jati hay jn kay liye tyza tr tlash ki zurwrt hawty hay ، jabky srkh rngh kay drkhtwn ko un ayply kyshnza kay liye trjyha di jati hay jn main tyzay sy dakhl hony aur hazaf karnay ki karrwaiywn ki zurwrt hawty haay۔

Question: rydaks drkht kesay kam krta haay؟
Answer: ayk rydaks try ، jsay rydaks try ya kmpykt pryfks try kay nam sy bhi jana jata hay ، ayk aadad wa shmar ka dahanchha hay jo khlaiy sy bhatr try (sabkha drkht) ki nmaindghy krta hay js main hr nwda jo aklwta bchha hawta hay is kay waldyn kay sath mil jata haay۔ntyjha yeh hay keh hr dakhly nwda kay bchwn ki tadad zayada tr rydaks try kay rydaks aar par hawty hay ، jahan aar ayk msabt add aur 2 ka pawr ayks hay ، js main x ≥ 1. rydaks kay drkht is kay sath ayswsy aytw safwn ki tamyr kay liye mfyd hayn۔chabyan jn ka azahaar tar kay tawr par kya jaskta haay۔anhayn aai py rwtngh kay shabay main khsawsay atalak mlta hay ، jahan kuch mstsanyat kay sath akdar ki bray hadwd rkhnay ki salahayt khasa tawr par IP ptay ki drjha bndy ki tnzaym kay liye mwzawn haay۔wha malwmat ki bazayaft main tykst dstawyzaat kay alty asharyha kay liye bhi astamal hawtay hayn۔rydaks drkht andraj ، hazaf karnay ، aur tlash kay kamwn ki hamayt karty hayn۔zakhyrha shuda dayta ki mkdar ko kam sy kam karnay ki kwshsh karty hoey andraj traiy main ayk nya tar shaml krta haay۔zakhyrha shuda aadad wa shmar ki mkdar ko kam sy kam karnay ki kwshsh karty hoey hazaf karnay sy traiy sy ayk tar hat jata haay۔tlash karnay sy kesi dyiay gaye klyd sy wabstha kdr mil jati haay۔rydaks kay drkht apnay dayta ko knarwn ki trtyb main srayt karty hain js sy nwda ki taraf jata haay۔as ka mtalb yeh hay keh sirf ptay (nychay dyiay gaye nwdas) wakay ayk kwdada kdr ki nmaindghy karty hayn۔kwdada wylyw woh rastha hay jo is ki taraf jata haay۔rydaks kay drkht nwdas ko zum krkay nwda awwr hayda ko bchanay kay liye "path kmpryshn" namy kesi chyza ka faidha athatay hayn۔jb khud mtwazan bainry tlash kay drkhtwn kay mkablay main rydaks kay drkht ayk aasan aur zayada jghha sy mwsar dahanchay kay tawr par dayzaain kyay gaye hayn۔

Question: by try kya hay aur yeh bainry srch kay drkht sy kesay mkhtlf haay؟
Answer: ayk by try ayk khud twazan rkhnay waly drkhtwn kay aadad wa shmar ka dahanchha hay jo trtyb shuda dayta ko brkrar rkhta hay aur lwghrthmk wkt main tlash ، trtyb tak rsaiy ، azuafay aur hazaf karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔yha drkht ki ayk ksm hay jo dask tak rsaiy kay l optim bhatr hay aur dayta bys aur fail sstm main astamal hawty haay۔by try bainry srch try sy mndrjha zayl tarykwn sy mkhtlf haay: by try main do sy zayada bchay hawsktay hain ، jabky bainry srch ka drkht zayada sy zayada do bchwn main hawskta haay۔ ayk by try ayk chhantya hoa drkht hay ، jabky aykbainry srch try ko lazmi tawr par trtyb nahin diya jata haay۔ aay by try dask par dayta astwryj kay liye astamal hawta hay ، jabky bainry srch try ram main dayta astwryj kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ by try main lagh aym ayn ki awnchaiy hawty hay ، jahan aym aardar hawta haaydrkht aur ayn main nwdas ki tadad hay ، jabky bainry srch try ki awnchaiy lagh 2 ayn ki hay ، jahan n nwdas ki tadad haay۔ by trywn ko ayply kyshnza main astamal kya jata hay jahan dayta ko dask par mhafwza kya jata hay aur tyza rftar rsaiy ki zurwrt hawty haay۔wha dayta bys aur fail sstm main bhi bray mkdar main dayta ko mwsar andaza main zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔ khlasaha main ، by try ayk khud twazan drkhtwn kay aadad wa shmar ka dahanchha hay jo trtyb shuda dayta ko brkrar rkhta hay aur tlash ، trtyb tak rsaiy ، azuafay aur lwghrthmk wkt main hazaf karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔yha bainry srch try sy mkhtlf hay js main is main do sy zayada bchay hawsktay hain ، ayk chhantya hoa drkht hay ، dask par dayta astwryj kay liye astamal hawta hay ، aur is ki awnchaiy lagh aym ayn ki haay۔ by trywn ko ayply kyshnza main astamal kya jata hay jahan dayta haay۔dask aur fast tak rsaiy par zakhyrha karnay ki zurwrt hay 123456

Question: astyk aur ktaar kay darmiyan frk ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: astyks aur ktaaryn aadad wa shmar ko zakhyrha karnay aur bazayaft karnay kay liye kmpywtr sains main astamal hony waly do bnyady aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay hayn۔astyk aur ktaar kay darmiyan bnyady frk aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay sy anasar ko hata diya jata haay۔ astyk: aakhry un frst aaؤt (LIFO) asawl ki pyrwy krta hay ، is ka mtalb hay keh astyk main shaml aakhry ansar pehla ayk haayhata diya jana chahaiay۔ ansarwn ko astyk kay awpry hasaay sy shaml aur hata diya jata haay۔ kamn aapryshnza main psh (astyk kay awpry hasaay main ansar shaml kryn) aur pap (astyk sy upar ka ansar ko hata dyn) shaml hayn۔ astyk aksar bar bar bar bar chlnay waly alghwrthm kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔ya mlahazaha ki hogi ryastwn ki tarykh ko brkrar rkhnay kay liay۔ hakyky dnya ki ayply kyshnza kay msaalwn main prwghramngh zabanwn main kal astyk aur wyb braؤzarza main byk btn shaml haay۔ktaar main shaml ansar ko sab sy pehlay hataya jata haay۔ ktaar kay akby hasaay main ansar shaml kyay jatay hain aur ktaar kay samnay sy hata dyiay jatay hayn۔ kamn aapryshnza main ankyw (ktaar kay akby hasaay main ansar shaml kryn) aur daykwiw (hataiyn) shaml hayn۔ktaar sy samnay ka ansar). kywis aksar un haalat main astamal hawtay hain jahan prwsysngh ka hakm zurwry hawta hay ، jesay kamwn ka shydawlngh ya prwsysngh ki drkhwastwn myn۔ hakyky dnya ki ayply kyshnza kay msaalwn main ghrwsry astwr par chyk aaؤt lain aur aay main prnt ki nwkry shaml hawty haay۔prntr ktaar۔ un khlasaha ، astyk aur ktaar kay darmiyan bnyady frk js tarah sy aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay sy anasar ko hata diya jata haay۔ayk astyk LIFO asawl ki pyrwy krta hay ، jabky ayk ktaar FIFO asawl ki pyrwy krty haay۔astyk aksar bar bar bar bar chlnay wali alghwrthm kay liye ya mlahazaha ki hogi ryastwn ki tarykh ko brkrar rkhnay kay liye astamal kyay jatay hain ، jabky ktaaryn aksar aysay haalat main astamal hawty hain jahan prwsysngh ka hakm zurwry hawta hay ، jesay kamwn ki shydawlngh ya prwsysngh ki Question: fynwk drkht kya hay aur is ka astamal kesay hawta haay؟
Answer: ayk fynwk drkht ، jsay bainry andayksda try (BIT) bhi kaha jata hay ، ayk dayta dahanchha hay jo ayk saf main mwsar ap dayt aur sabkha rkm kay hasab ktab ki ajazat dyta haay۔yha hadwd ki rkm ko mwsar andaza main hasab karnay aur kesi saf main ansar ki akdar ko ap dayt karnay kay liye mfyd haay۔fynwk try ayk dayta dahanchha hay jo kesi saf main dayta ko zakhyrha krta hay ، haalankha isy drkht kaha jata haay۔as ki wjha yeh hay keh saf main hr syl asal saf main mtadd anasar ki rkm ko zakhyrha karnay ka zamha dar haay۔andayks I par syl (G (i) ، i) sy anasar ki rkm ko zakhyrha karnay ka zamha dar hay ، jahan G (i) syl I ki zamha dary ki had main pehla andayks haay۔chwnkha fynwk try ki awnchaiy lagh (ayn) hay ، lhazaa tazaha kary aur astfsar ki karrwaiywn main zayada sy zayada lagh (ayn) wkt lghta haay۔as sy fynwk try ko aysay haalat kay l data dayta ka ayk mfyd dahanchha bnta hay jahan aksar ap dayt kay swalat hawtay hayn۔fynwk kay drkht ki sab sy aam atalak mtadd addywn ki rkm ka hasab lghana haay۔ fynwk try astamal karna aasan hay aur kwda ، khasa tawr par ksayr jhaty safwn ki sawrt myn۔asay bainry andayksda try bhi kaha jata hay ، ya sirf thwraa sa mkhtsa kya jata haay۔fynwk try ko sab sy pehlay 1994 main pytr aym fynwk kay zaryaha "mjmway tadd tyblza kay liye ayk nya dayta dahanchha" kay anwan sy ayk mkalay main byan kya gaya tha۔ fynwk try ko anasar kay sath ayk par mbny saf par ghwr krkay aasany sy smjha jata haay۔mtalkha fynwk drkht ki jra par ayk mzumr nwda 0 kay sath nwdas hayn۔drkht ki hr staha main nwdas hawtay hain jn main asharyay kay sath asharay hawtay hayn۔bainry dahyr kay nfaza kay liay.as nmaindghy main ، rwt nwda 0 ko chhwra diya gaya hay aur srny kay asharay drkht main nwda andayks (1 par mbny asharyha ka astamal karty hawiay) kay mtaabk braha rast mtaabkt rkhtay hayn۔ khlasaha main ، ayk fynwk try ayk dayta dahanchha hay js par mwsar ap dayts aur sabkha rkm kay hasab ktab ki ajazat mlty haay۔ayk safyha hadwd ki rkm ko mwsar andaza main hasab karnay aur kesi saf main ansar ki akdar ko ap dayt karnay kay liye mfyd haay۔fynwk ka drkht astamal karna aasan hay aur kwda ، khasa tawr par ksayr jhaty safwn ki sawrt myn۔asay bainry andayksda try bhi kaha jata hay ، ya sirf thwraa sa mkhtsa kya jata haay۔fynwk try ko sab sy pehlay 1994 main pytr aym fynwk kay zaryaha "mjmway tadd tyblza kay liye ayk nya dayta dahanchha" kay anwan sy ayk mkalay main byan kya gaya tha۔ fynwk try ko anasar kay sath ayk par mbny saf par ghwr krkay aasany sy smjha jata haay۔mtalkha fynwk drkht ki jra par ayk mzumr nwda 0 kay sath nwdas hayn۔chwnkha bnata hay jahan aksar ap dayt kay swalat hawtay hayn۔

Question: ghnty ki trtyb alghwrthm kesay kam krty haay؟
Answer: ghnty ki tarah ayk lkyry chhantnay wala alghwrthm hay jo chabyan kay mtaabk ashyaa kay zakhyray ko trtyb dyta hay jo chhwtay msabt add hayn۔yha un ashyaa ki tadad ki ghnty krkay kam krta hay jo alag alag aham akdar kay malk hain aur aaؤt pt tslsl main hr klydy kdr ki pwzayshnwn ka tayn karnay kay liye un ghntywn par sabkha rkm ka atalak karty hayn۔ghnty ki tarah ayk ghair hum aahanghy par mbny alghwrthm hay ، js ka mtalb hay keh un ko trtyb denay kay liye anasar ka mwazanha nahin kya jata haay۔as kay bjaiay ، yeh frzu krta hay keh un pt anasar had [0 ، K] main add hayn۔jb K = O (n) ، tou ghnty ki trtyb O (n) wkt main chlay ghy۔ ghnty trtyb waly alghwrthm ka kam mndrjha zayl haay: dyiay gaye srny sy zayada sy zayada ansar (zayadha sy zayada hony dyn) tlash kryn۔tmam anasar kay sath lmbaiy zayada sy zayadha+1 ki 0. yeh saf srny main anasar ki ghnty ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal ki jati haay۔ un pt srny ko rjwa karain aur ghnty srny main isi ansar ki ghnty main azuafha kryn۔aaؤt pt tslsl main hr klydy kdr ki pwzayshnwn ka tayn kryn۔ un pt srny ko dwbarha rjwa karain aur hr ansar ko apni sahayha pwzayshn main aaؤt pt srny main rkhyn۔an pt dayta ki had ko trtyb denay kay liye ashyaa ki tadad sy nmayan tawr par zayada nahin haay۔yha aksar dusray chhantnay waly alghwrthm jesay rydaks trtyb main sbrwtain kay tawr par astamal hawta haay۔ghnty ki tarah ki wkt ki pychydghy O (n+K) hay ، jahan un pt srny main anasar ki tadad hay aur K un pt dayta ki had haay۔ghnty ki tarah ki khlaiy pychydghy bhi O (n+K) hay ، jo isy khlaiy mwsar alghwrthm bnaty haay۔ un ka khlasaha ، ghnty ki tarah ayk lkyry chhant raha alghwrthm hay jo chabyan kay mtaabk ashyaa kay zakhyray ko trtyb dyta hay jo chhwtay msabt add hayn۔yha ayk ghair tkwyt par mbny alghwrthm hay jo frzu krta hay keh un pt anasar had [0 ، K] main addy hayn۔ghnty ki tarah mfyd hay jab un pt dayta ki had ko trtyb denay wali ashyaa ki tadad sy nmayan tawr par zayada nahin hawta haay۔ghnty ki tarah ki wkt ki pychydghy O (n+k) hay ، aur khlaiy pychydghy bhi O (n+k) hay

Answer: is bat ka tayn karnay kay liye keh aya do bainry drkht ayk jesay hain ، hamain yeh chyk karnay ki zurwrt hay keh drkhtwn ki ayk hi sakht aur hr nwda par ayk hi akdar hayn۔as chyk ko nafza karnay kay bohat sary tarykay hain ، lekin ayk aam nktaha nzar yeh hay keh hr nwda kay baien aur dien sbtrywn ka mwazanha karnay kay liye tkrar ka astamal kya jaiay۔ yahan ayk fnkshn ka ayk azaghr ka nfaza hay is bat ka tayn karnay kay liye keh aya do bainry drkht ayk jesay hayn: azaghrklas nwda: dayf __init__.rwt 2 koi nahin haay: agar rwt 1 koi nahin hay ya rwt 2 koi nahin hay tou koi nahin hay ya koi bhi nahin haay: agar rwt 1.Val! = rwt 2.Val: ghalat rytrn aai ays_jynykl (rwt 1. lyft ، rwt 2۔ lyft) aur aai ays_jynykl (rwt 1. rait ، rwt 2۔ rwt 2۔ rait 2۔ rait 2۔) is_identical fnkshn do bainry drkhtwn ki jrawn ko un pt kay tawr par lyta hay aur agar drkht ayk jesay hain ، aur ghalat hain tou schaiy lwttay hayn۔yha pehlay janch pratal krta hay keh aya dono jrayn koi nahin hain ، aysy sawrt main yeh schaiy lwtty haay۔aghr sirf ayk jra koi nahin hay tou ، yeh ghalat lwtta haay۔aghr jrawn ki akdar brabr nahin hain tou ، yeh ghalat lwtty haay۔bsawrt dyghr ، yeh bar bar janch pratal krta hay keh aya hr nwda kay baien aur dien zayly zayly ayk jesay hayn۔ khlasaha yeh hay keh aya do bainry drkht ayk jesay hain ، hum hr nwda kay baien aur dien sab trywn ka mwazanha karnay kay liye tkrar ka astamal krsktay hayn۔is_identical fnkshn do bainry drkhtwn ki jrawn ko un pt kay tawr par lyta hay aur agar drkht ayk jesay hawtay hain tou woh drst hawjatay hain ، aur dusri sawrt main ghalat hain ، aur dusri sawrt main 123456.1 tykkraskwrs 2 aydawkytyw 3 jy ay ay ay ay ay ay ay ay ay ay ay ay ay ays 4 tkyfwrwrda 5 jaywatpwaint 6 jaywat pwaint pwaint

Answer: ghair trtyb shuda saf main kay ty aych kay sab sy braay ansar ko tlash karnay kay bohat sary tarykay hayn۔ayk nktaha nzar yeh hay keh ab tak kay sab sy braay anasar ko tryk rkhnay kay liye zayada sy zayada dahyr ka astamal kya jaiay۔ham saf kay pehlay K anasar kay sath ayk zayada sy zayada dahyr shrwa krsktay hain ، aur phir saf kay baky anasar kay zaryaay tkrar krsktay hayn۔har ansar kay l if ، agar yeh zayada sy zayada dahyr main kam sy kam ansar sy zayada hay tou ، hum kam sy kam ansar ko niay ansar kay sath tbdyl krsktay hain aur isi kay mtaabk dahyr ko aydajst krsktay hayn۔aakhr main ، zayada sy zayada dahyr main zayada sy zayada ansar srny ka sab sy braa ansar hawgha۔ yahan is nktaha nzar ka azaghr ka nfaza haay: paiythwnympwrt haypkydaf Kth_larget (nmbr ، kay): hayp = nmbr [: K] hayp kyw aypyfaiy (dahyr) nmbr main nmbr [K:]: agar num> hayp [0]: hayp kyw haaipry plys (hayp ، nmbr) rytrn hayp [0] Kth_largest fnkshn un pt kay tawr par antyjr nmbr aur ayk addy K ki ayk saf lyta hay ، aur lwtta haaysrny main kay ty aych ka sab sy braa ansar۔yha saf kay pehlay K anasar kay sath ayk zayada sy zayada dahyr ka aaghaza krta hay ، aur phir saf kay baky anasar kay zaryaay tkrar krta haay۔har ansar kay l if ، agar yeh zayada sy zayada dahyr main kam sy kam ansar sy zayada hay tou ، yeh kam sy kam ansar ko niay ansar kay sath tbdyl krta hay aur isi kay mtaabk dahyr ko aydajst krta haay۔aakhr main ، zayada sy zayada dahyr main zayada sy zayada ansar srny main kay ty aych ty ka sab sy braa ansar hawgha۔ khlasaha main ، baghair kesi sray main kay ty aych kay sab sy braay ansar ko tlash karnay kay l we ، hum dekha janay waly kay sab sy braay anasar ko tryk rkhnay kay liye zayada sy zayada dahyr astamal krsktay hayn۔ab tk.Kth_larget fnkshn is nktaha nzar ko Python123.1 javatPoint2leetCode3geeksforgeeks main nafza krta hay

Question: srklr bfr dayta dahanchay ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: ayk srklr bfr ، jsay rngh bfr kay nam sy bhi jana jata hay ، ayk mkrrha saiza ka dayta dahanchha hay jo aam tawr par ryil taim saft wyir ayply kyshnza main astamal kya jata hay takha pehlay sy taay shuda kdrwn ko zakhyrha kya jaskay۔yha khasa tawr par un haalat main mfyd hay jahan aadad wa shmar ko mslsl nmwnha bnaya jarhaa hay aur pehlay sy taay shuda nmwnay kay saiza ka astamal karty hoey hasab ktab karnay ki zurwrt hay ya mslsl tsawr ki zurwrt haay۔as tarah kay aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay ki FIFO (phalay un frst aaؤt) nwayt par kbzuha karnay kay liye ayk mkrrha tadad main pwzayshnwn kay sath rngh ki mshabhat kafy mfyd haay۔ayk bar jab bfr bhra hoa hay tou ، pehla ansar jo bfr ko lkha gaya tha ("in") aghlay aanay waly ansar kay zaryaha awwr rait ("aaؤt") haay۔ ayk srklr bfr ko srny ya lnkda ka astamal karty hoey nafza kya jaskta haay۔fharstsrklr bfr ko nafza karnay ka sab sy khwbsawrt tarykha ayk saf ka astamal haay۔srny ko ayk mkrrha saiza kay sath shrwa kya jaskta hay ، aur do pwaintrza ko prahnay aur lkhnay ki pwzayshnwn ko tryk rkhnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔prahnay waly pwaintr aghlay ansar ko prahnay kay liye nshandhay karty hain ، aur lkhnay ka asharha aghlay ansar ki taraf asharha krta haay۔jb lkhnay ka asharha srny kay akhttam par phanch jata hay tou ، yeh saf kay aaghaza tak lpyt jata haay۔asy tarah ، jab ryda pwaintr saf kay akhttam par phanch jata hay ، tou yeh srny kay aaghaza tak lpyt jata haay۔ yahan ayk srny ka astamal karty hoey srklr bfr ka ayk azaghr ka nfaza haay: paiytwnklas srklr bfr: dayf __ __init __ (khwd ، saiza): khwd۔ saiza۔= saiza self.buffer = [kwiy nhayn] * saiza khwd۔٪ self.size agar sell.bfr [self.read] self.read = (self.read + 1) ٪ khwd۔ saiza ki wapsy walwyth srklr bfr klas main ayk msaal mtghyr bfr hawta hay jo srklr bfr ki nmaindghy krta hay ، jo saiza kay saiza ki ayk saf haay۔prahnay aur lkhnay kay asharay bfr main prahnay aur lkhnay ki pwzayshnwn par nzar rkhtay hayn۔Writ_value tarykha mwjwdha tharyry pwzayshn par bfr ko ayk kdr lkhta hay ، aur phir lkhnay kay pwaintr main azuafha krta haay۔aghr tharyry pwaintr ryda pwaintr tak phanch jata hay tou ، bfr main kdym trien kymt ko awwr rait karnay sy bchnay kay liye prahnay waly pwaintr main azuafha hawta haay۔READ_VALUE tarykha mwjwdha prahnay ki pwzayshn par bfr sy ayk kdr prahta hay ، aur phir ryda pwaintr main azuafha krta haay۔aghr ryda pwaintr rait pwaintr tak phanch jata hay tou ، koi bhi is bat ki nshandhay karnay kay liye waps nahin kya jata hay keh bfr khaly haay۔ khlasaha main ، ayk srklr bfr ayk mkrrha saiza ka dayta dahanchha hawta hay jo aam tawr par pehlay sy taay shuda tadad ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye ryil taim saft wyir ayply kyshnza main astamal hawta haay۔akdar kyasay srny ya mnslk fharst ka astamal karty hoey nafza kya jaskta haay۔srklr bfr klas paiythwn 123456.1 main ayk srny ka astamal karty hoey ayk srklr bfr ka atalak krty haay۔

daiyn_haait)> 1) {ghlta lwtaiyn ؛} waps isbalanced (nwda-> baiyn) && isbalanced (nwda-> daiyn) ؛} ant myn () {nwda* rwt* rwt = nya nwda {1 ، nya nwda {2 ، nya nwda {4 ، nwlptr ، nwlptr} ، nya nwda{5 ، nwlptr ، nwlptr}} ، nya nwda {3 ، nwlptr ، nwlptr}} ؛aghr (isbalanced (jra)) {std :: cout << "bainry try mtwazan haay" << std :: endl ؛} dusri {std :: cout << "bainry try mtwazan nahin haay" << std :: endl ؛} wapsy 0 ؛} yeh prwghram ayk dahanchay kay nwda ki wzuahat krta hay jo bainry drkht main nwda ki nmaindghy krta haay۔prwghram main do afaal ki bhi wzuahat ki hogi haay: awnchaiy () aur isbalanced ()۔awnchaiy () fnkshn bainry drkht main nwda ki awnchaiy ka hasab ktab krta haay۔isbalanced () fnkshn chyk krta hay keh agar kesi bainry try ko hr nwda kay baien aur dien sab trywn ki awnchaiy ka hasab lghakr mtwazan kya jata hay aur yeh janch pratal karty hain keh aya awnchaiywn kay darmiyan frk 1 sy zayada nahin hay tou agar kesi nwda kay liye frk 1 sy zayada hay tw، fnkshn ghalat lwtta haay۔bsawrt dyghr ، yeh bar bar janch pratal krta hay keh aya baien aur dien sbtryza mtwazan hayn۔ myn () fnkshn bainry drkht bnata hay ، agar yeh mtwazan () ka astamal karty hoey mtwazan hay ، aur is pygham ko prnt krta hay js sy yeh zaahar hawta hay keh bainry drkht mtwazan hay ya nhayn۔ msaal kay tawr pr۔، mndrjha zayl kwda bainry try tyar krta hay ، agar yeh mtwazan hay tou chyk krta hay ، aur ayk pygham prnt krta haay: C ++ nwda* rwt = nya nwda {1 ، nya nwda {2 ، nya nwda {4 ، nwlptr ، nwlptr} ، nya nwda {5 ، nullptr ، nullptr}} ، nya nwda {3 ، nwlptr ، nwlptr}} if agar (isbalanced (jra)) {std :: cout << "bainry try mtwazan haay"std :: cout << "bainry try mtwazan nahin haay" << std :: endl ؛} 1TakeUforward2techeidelight3geeksforgeeks4digitalocean5programize

Question: add ki ayk saf par anzumam karnay kay liye ayk prwghram lkhyn۔
Answer: addywn ki ayk saf par anzumam karnay kay liye C ++ main ayk prwghram haay: C ++#shaml <iosteream> nam aspys ays ty day ka astamal karty hoey ؛ batal anzumam (INT arr [] ، int l ، int m ، int r) {int n1 = m - l+1؛int n2 = r - m ؛int l [n1] ، r [n2] ؛kay liye (int i = 0 ؛ i <n1 ؛ i ++) {l [i] = arr [l+i] ؛} kay liye (int j = 0 ؛ j <n2 ؛ j ++) {r [j] = arr [m + 1 + j] ؛i ant i = 0 ، j = 0 ، k = l ؛jbkha (i <n1 && j <n2) {aghr (l [i] <= r [j]) {arr [k] = l [i] ؛i ++ ؛} else {arr [k] = r [j] ؛J ++ ؛} K ++ ؛} jabky (i <n1) {arr [k] = l [i] ؛i ++ ؛K ++ ؛} jabky (j <n2) {arr [k] = r [j] ؛J ++ ؛K ++ ؛}} batal anzumam (int arr [] ، int l ، int r) {if (l <r) {int m = l + (r - l) / 2 ؛anzumam (ARR ، L ، M) ؛anzumam (arr ، m + 1 ، r) ؛zum (ARR ، L ، M ، R) ؛}} batal prnt ayry (ant aar aar [] ، ant saiza) {kay liye (int i = 0 ؛ i <saiza ؛ i ++) {cout << arr [i] << "" ؛} cout << endl ؛} int myn () {int arr [] = {12 ، 11 ، 13 ، 5 ، 6 ، 7} ؛int arr_size = sizeof (arr) / sizeof (arr [0]) ؛cout << "dy hogi saf \ n" ؛prnt ayry (arr ، arr_size) ؛anzumam (arr ، 0 ، arr_size - 1) ؛cout << "\ nsorted srny \ n" hay ؛prnt ayry (arr ، arr_size) ؛waps 0 ؛} is prwghram main tyn afaal ki wzuahat ki hogi haay: anzumam () ، anzumam () ، aur prnt ayry ()۔anzumam () fnkshn ayk srny aar aar ، do asharay ayl aur aar ، aur ayk mdal andayks aym lyta hay aur do sbarry aar aar [ayl.. aym] aur aar aar [aym+1..r] ko ayk hi trtyb shuda sbry aar aay aar main zum krta hay [l..r].anzumam () fnkshn ayk srny aar aar ، do andayks ayl aur aar lyta hay ، aur anzumam () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey sbry aar aar [ayl.. aar] ko bar bar trtyb dyta haay۔prnt ary () fnkshn ayk srny aar aar aur is kay saiza ka saiza lyta hay aur srny kay anasar ko prnt krta haay۔ myn () fnkshn ayk srny aar aar tshkyl dyta hay ، asal saf ko prnt krta hay ، mrjwrt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey sray ko trtyb dyta hay ، aur trtyb shuda trtyb ko prnt krta haay۔srny۔ msaal kay tawr par ، mndrjha zayl kwda ayk saf tyar krta hay ، asal saf ko prnt krta hay ، mrjwrt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey srny ko trtyb dyta hay ، aur trtyb shuda saf ko prnt krta haay: C ++ INT ARR [] = {12 ، 11 ، 13 ، 5 ،6 ، 7} int int arr_size = sizeof (arr) / sizeof (arr [0]) ؛ cout << "dyiay gaye srny \ n" ؛ prntraay (arr ، arr_size) ؛ mrjwrt (arr ، 0 ، arr_size - Question: askyp lst dayta dahanchay ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: askyp lst ayk amkany aadad wa shmar ka dahanchha hay jo lnkda lst 1234 kay sath anasar ya dayta ki trtyb shuda fharst ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha ayk hi mrhalay main pori fharst kay mtadd anasar ko chhwra kar anasar ya dayta ki mwsar prwsysngh ki ajazat dyta hay ، isi wjha sy isy askyp lst 2 kay nam sy jana jata haay۔askyp lst mnslk fharst ka ayk twsya shuda wrzen hay aur yeh do prtwn main bnaya gaya haay: sab sy kam prt aur awpry prt 2۔askyp lst ki sab sy kam prt ayk aam trtyb shuda lnkda fharst hay ، aur askyp lst ki awpry prtyn ayk "ayksprys lain" ki tarah hain jahan anasar ko chhwra diya jata haay۔ is ka ayk mkhtsar jaizaha hay keh askyp lst kesay kam krty haay: askyp lst haay۔azuafy farwrda pwaintrza kay sath ayk mnslk fharst۔ farwrda pwaintrza tlash kay doran kuch anasar ko chhwranay ki ajazat dytay hain ، js sy tlash ko tyza tr hawta haay۔ farwrda pwaintr mmknha tawr par bnaiay jatay hain ، lhazaa askyp lst bay trtyb dayta dahanchha haay۔ askyp lywl) {this-> key = key ؛farwrda = nya nwda*[staha+1] ؛mymsyt (farwrda ، 0 ، saiza (nwda*)*(staha+1)) ؛} nwda :: ~ nwda () {hazaf karain [] farwrda ؛} klas askyplst {awamy: askyplst () ؛~ askyplst () Question: yeh chyk karnay kay liye ayk fnkshn lkhyn keh aya do dawr ayk dusray kay anaghram hain ya nhayn۔
Answer: yeh chyk karnay kay bohat sary tarykay hain keh aya do dawr ayk dusray kay anaghram hain ya nhayn۔yhaan kuch aam tarykay hayn: tar main hr krdar ki tadd ko ghnnay kay liye lght ka astamal karty hawiay: hum do lghat pyda krsktay hain ، hr ayk tar kay liye ayk ، aur hr krdar ki tar main zaahar hony ki tadad ko ghn saktay hayn۔aghr lghat brabr hain ، tou phir do asal dawr anaghram hayn۔as tarykha kar ka ayk azaghr ka nfaza yahan haay: pythndaf aai ays_anghm (ays 1 ، ays 2): agar lyn (ays 1)! = lyn (ays 2): ghalat dakt 1 = {} dakt 2 = {} S1 main char kay liay: dakt 1 [char] = dakt 1۔S2 main char kay liye (char ، 0) + 1 haasal kryn: dakt 2 [char] = dakt 2۔byt (char ، 0) + 1 wapsy dakt 1 == dakt 2 prnt (is_anagram ("angram" ، "nagharam")) # trwpnt (is_anagram (is_anagram (is_anagram (is_anagram ")"haylw" ، "wrlda"))) # azaghr main klykshn madaywl sy kaؤntr klas ko ghalat astamal krna: kaؤntr klas un pt kay tawr par kabl tklyd lyta hay aur is kay kabl hr ansar ki tadd ko ghnta haay۔ham hr tar ko un pt kay tawr par kesi kaؤntr aabjykt kay pas mntkl krsktay hain aur do kaؤntr ashyaa ka mwazanha krsktay hayn۔as tarykha kar ka ayk azaghr ka nfaza yahan haay: azaghr kay klykshn ampwrt kaؤntr dayf is_anagram (S1 ، S2): rytrn kaؤntr (S1) == kaؤntr (S2) prnt (is_anagram ("agnagram" ، "nagaram")) # sch prnt (IS_Anagram ("haylw"،" wrlda ")) # tarwn ki ghalat fhamy aur un ka mwazanha krna: hum hr tar main krdarwn ko trtyb dy saktay hain aur trtyb shuda tarwn ka mwazanha krsktay hayn۔aghr trtyb dyiay gaye dawr brabr hain ، tou do asal dawr anaghram hayn۔yhaan jawa is tarykha kar par aml draamd haay: jawaympwrt java.util.Arrays ؛ awamy klas anaghram {awamy jamd bwlyn asanghghram (strngh S1 ، strngh S2) {aghr (s1.length ()! = s2.length ()) {ghlta waps ؛} char [] chyrry 1 = s1.tochararray () ؛char [] chyrry 2 = s2.tochararray () ؛arrays.sort (charary 1) ؛arrays.sort (chyrary 2) ؛wapsy arrays.equals (chyrry 1 ، chyrry 2) ؛} awamy jamd batal myn (strngh [] aarghs) {system.out.println (isanagram ("snw" ، "khamwsh")) ؛// true system.out.println (isanagram ("haylw" ، "dnya")) ؛// ghlta}} aakhr main ، yeh chyk karnay kay bohat sary tarykay hain keh aya do dawr ayk dusray kay anaghram hain ya nhayn۔ham tar main hr krdar ki tadd ko ghnnay ، azaghr main klykshn madaywl sy kaؤntr klas ka astamal karnay kay liye ayk lght ka astamal krsktay hain ، ya tarwn ko trtyb dy saktay hain aur un ka mwazanha krsktay hayn۔

Question: add ki saf par bainry tlash karnay kay liye ayk prwghram lkhyn۔
Answer: addywn ki ayk saf par bainry tlash karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl alghwrthm ka astamal krsktay hayn: do pwaintrza ko ، kam aur unchay hasaay ko srny kay pehlay aur aakhry asharywn par baltrtyb shrwa karain ، sray kay drmyany asharyha ko drmyany = (km km+ aaly) // 2. agar srny ka drmyany ansar hadf ansar kay brabr hay tou ، mdal andayks waps kryn۔ agar saf ka drmyany ansar hadf ansar sy zayada hay tou ، unchi trtyb dy kar saf kay baien nsaf ko tlash kryn۔= wsta - 1. agar srny ka drmyany ansar hadf ansar sy kam hay tou ، kam = wsta + trtyb dy kar saf kay dien nsaf tlash kryn۔thk janay walay۔ yahan bainry srch alghwrthm kay kuch azaghr kay nfazaat hayn: thwray dyr lwp ka astamal karty hawiay: paiythndaf bainry_srch (aay aar aar ، hadf): kam = 0 haaiy = lyn (aay aar aar) - 1 jabky kam <= aaly: drmyany = (km + aaly)// 2 agar err [wsta] == hadf: mda alyf aar aar [wsta] <hadf: kam = wsta + 1 awr: aaly = wsta - 1 wapsy -1 aay aar aar = [1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 4 ، 5 ، 6، 7 ، 8 ، 9] targht = 5result = bainry_srch (aay aar aar ، hadf) agar ntyjha!} saf main mwjwd nahin haay۔: mda aylf aar aar aar [mda] <targht: bainry_srch (aay aar aar ، targht ، mda + 1 ، awncha) lwtaiyn awr: bainry_srch (aay aar aar ، hadf ، kam ، wsta - 1) aar aay aar = [1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 4 ،5 ، 6 ، 7 ، 8 ، 9] targht = 5 ryzawlt = bainry_srch (aay aar aar ، targht ، 0 ، lyn (aay aar aar) - 1) agar ntyjha! = -1: prnt (ayf "ansar {hadf and andayks main mwjwd haay} ") awr: prnt (ayf" ansar {hadf} srny main mwjwd nahin hay ") dono par aml draamd main ، bainry_srch () fnkshn ayk srny aar aar ، ayk hadf ansar ka hadf ، aur do asharay kam aur awnchaiy lyta hay jo tlash ki wzuahat krta haay۔hadfnkshn srny main hadf ansar ka andayks lwtata hay agar yeh paya jata hay ، ya agar yeh nahin mil jata hay tou -1۔phala aml draamd bainry tlash ko anjam denay kay l a thwray dyr ka astamal krta hay ، jabky dusra aml draamd tkrar ka astamal krta haay۔ msaal kay tawr par ، mndrjha zayl kwda ayk srny tkhlyk krta hay ، kesi hadf kay ansar kay liye saf par bainry tlash krta hay ، aur is ka ntyjha prnt krta haay: azaghr =1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 4 ، 5 ، 6 ، 7 ، 8 ، 9] hadf = 5Result = bainry_srch (ARR ، hadf) agar ntyjha!") awr: prnt (ayf" ansar {hadf} saf main mwjwd nahin hay ")

Question: ayk prwghram lkhyn takha is bat ka tayn kya jaskay keh dyiay gaye bainry try mtwazan bainry tlash ka drkht hay ya nhayn۔
Answer: is bat ka tayn karnay kay liye keh agar dyiay gaye bainry ka drkht mtwazan bainry srch drkht hay tou ، hamain yeh chyk karnay ki zurwrt hay keh ، drkht kay hr nwda kay liye ، is kay baien sab try ki awnchaiy aur is kay dien sab try ki awnchaiy kay darmiyan frk 1 sy zayada nahin haay۔yha haalt drkht kay hr nwda kay liye drst hay ، phir drkht mtwazan bainry tlash ka drkht haay۔ yahan ayk fnkshn ka ayk azaghr ka nfaza hay jo chyk krta hay keh agar bainry ka drkht mtwazan bainry srch drkht haay: azaghrklas nwda: dayf __ (khwd ، wyl ، wyl ، wyl ، wyl ، wyl ، wyl ، wyl): sylf۔ wwl = wyl sylf۔rait_haait)> 1: ghalat wapsy aai ays_ bylnsda (rwt.lft) aur aai ays_blnsda (rwt. rait) dayf awnchaiy (nwda): agar nwda koi nahin haay: waps 0 lwt waps 1 + zayada sy zayada (awnchaiy (nwda.lft) ، awnchaiy (nwda۔daiyn))# msaal ywzayghrwt = nwda (4) jra۔ lyft = nwda (2) rwt۔ rait = nwda (6) jra۔.left = nwda (5) rwt. rait. rait = nwda (7) prnt (is_balanced (jra)) # aaؤt pt: is aml ko sch main ، nwda klas bainry drkht main ayk nwda ki nmaindghy krta haay۔aaiy ays_blnsda () fnkshn bainry drkht ki jra nwda ko un pt kay tawr par lyta hay aur agar drkht mtwazan bainry srch drkht hay tou ، ghalat haay۔awnchaiy () fnkshn bainry try main dyiay gaye nwda ki awnchaiy ka hasab lghata haay۔ msaal kay tawr par ، mndrjha zayl kwda bainry try tyar krta hay ، chyk krta hay agar yeh mtwazan bainry srch try hay ، aur ntyjha prnt krta haay: paiytwnrwt = nwda (4) jra.left = nwda (2) rwt۔ rait = nwda (6) jra.aylft.lft = nwda (1) rwt. lyft. rait = nwda (3) rwt۔ rait.ylft = nwda (5) jra۔= nwda (7) prnt (is_balanced (jra)) # aaؤt pt: schaiy ntyjha ، hum yeh taay krsktay hain keh agar dyiay gaye bainry ka drkht ayk mtwazan bainry srch try hay ، yeh janch kar kay ، agar drkht main hr nwda kay liye ، is ki awnchaiy kay darmiyan frk hay twbaiyn sab try aur is kay dien sab try ki awnchaiy 1 sy zayada nahin haay۔ hum is chyk ko ayk bar bar chlnay waly fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey nafza krsktay hain jo drkht main hr nwda ki awnchaiy ka hasab lghata hay aur chyk krta hay keh agar drkht hr nwda par mtwazan haay۔

Question: alfaza ki trtyb ko tar main alta karnay kay liye ayk prwghram lkhyn۔

Question: kam sy kam myks hayp dayta dahanchha ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: ayk mn myks ka dahyr ayk khsawsay bainry try dayta dahanchha hay jo ayk kam hayp aur zayada sy zayada hayp dono ki khsawsayat ko ykja krta haay۔yha is main kam sy kam aur zayada sy zayada anasar dono ko mstkl wkt ki bazayaft aur lwghrthmk wkt ko hatana fraham krta haay۔as sy dabl akhttamy trjyhay ktaar ko nafza karnay kay liye mn myks hayp ko ayk bohat hi mfyd dayta dahanchha bnata haay۔bainry mn-hayps aur zayada sy zayada hayps ki tarah ، kam sy kam myks hayps lwghrthmk andraj aur hazaf karnay ki hamayt karty hain aur lkyry wkt main tamyr kyay jasktay hayn۔mn myks kay dahyrwn ki aksar sray main wazuha tawr par nmaindghy ki jati haay۔mn myks hayp praprty yeh hay keh drkht main ayk bhi staha par hr nwda is ki tamam awlad sy kam hawta hay ، jabky drkht main ajyb staha par hr nwda apni tamam awlad sy zayada hawta haay۔ ayk kam sy kam myks dahyr ko nafza karnay kay liay۔، hum dayta ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye ayk saf ka astamal krsktay hayn۔ham andayks 1 sy zakhyrha karna shrwa krdytay hain ، nhayn۔ pwzayshn I main kesi bhi nwda kay liye ، is ka baien bchha [2i] par hay agar dstyab ho tou ، is ka dien bchha [2i+1] par hay tou [2i+1] hay ، aur is ka waldyn nwda [i par haay۔/2] agar dstyab haw۔braay pymanay par hayp main tyn aapryshnza hayn: dakhl karain aapryshn (taim pychydghy O (lagh ayn)) ، hazaf karain aapryshn (taim pychydghy O (lagh ayn)) ، aur nkalnay waly aapryshn (wkt ki pychydghy O (lagh ayn)) 2. aay mnt hayp ayk dahyr haayjhaan hr ayk waldyn nwda ، bshmwl jra ، apnay bchwn kay nwdas ki kymt sy kam ya is kay brabr haay۔ayk mnt kay dahyr ki sab sy aham praprty yeh hay keh chhwty ، ya kam sy kam kymt wala nwda hamyshha jra ka nwda hawgha۔ayk zayada sy zayada dahyr mؤsar tarykay sy ayk mnt kay dahyr ki bat chyt haay۔as shkl main ، hr waldyn nwda ، bshmwl jra ، apnay bchwn kay nwdas ki kymt sy zayada ya is kay brabr haay۔zayadha sy zayada dahyr ki aham jaiydad yeh hay keh sab sy bray ، ya zayada sy zayada kymt wala nwda hamyshha jra nwda par hawgha۔dwnwn ksm kay dahyr mkhtlf ayply kyshnza 234 main karaamd hayn۔ akhttam par ، ayk mn myks hayp ayk khasa bainry try dayta dahanchha hay jo ayk mn chhpy aur zayada sy zayada hayp dono ki khsawsayat ko ykja krta haay۔yha is main kam sy kam aur zayada sy zayada anasar dono ko mstkl wkt ki bazayaft aur lwghrthmk wkt ko hatana fraham krta haay۔ham dayta ko zakhyrha karnay aur dakhl karnay ، hazaf karnay ، aur nkalnay kay kam anjam denay kay liye ayk srny ka astamal karty hoey ayk mn myks kay dahyr ko nafza krsktay hayn۔mzayd braan ، hum mkhtlf ayply kyshnza kay liye kam sy kam dahyr aur zayada sy zayada dahyr astamal krsktay hayn۔

Question: do trtyb shuda safwn kay wsta tlash karnay kay liye ayk prwghram lkhyn۔
Answer: do trtyb shuda safwn kay wsta ko tlash karnay kay l we ، hum kiy nktaha nzar astamal krsktay hayn۔ayk nktaha nzar yeh hay keh dono safwn ko ayk hi trtyb shuda saf main zum karain aur phir Question: blwm fltr dayta dahanchay ko nafza kryn۔

afaal ko ansar par laghw karty hain aur fltr main isi tarah kay bts mrtb karty hayn۔fltr main kesi ansar ki rknyt ki janch kay l we ، hum haysh kay afaal ko ansar par laghw karty hain aur chyk karty hain keh aya fltr main mtalkha tamam bts syt hain ya nhayn۔aghr koi bts syt nahin hay tou ، ansar ykyny tawr par syt main nahin haay۔aghr tamam bts mrtb kyay gaye hain tou ، ansar shayad syt 132 main Question: ayk naghwar syt dayta dahanchay ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: ayk naghwar syt dayta dahanchha ، jsay ywnyn ft dayta dahanchha bhi kaha jata hay ، ayk dayta dahanchha hay jo kiy naghwar (ghyr awwrlypngh) sbsyts main tksym shuda anasar kay ayk syt par nzar rkhta haay۔yha mndrjha zayl karrwaiywn ki hamayt krta haay: napsndydha syt main niay syt shaml krna۔syt dayta dahanchha un msail ko hal karnay main mfyd hay js main ayk syt ko napsndydha zayly sytwn main tksym karna aur un sab sytwn par kam anjam dena shaml haay۔mtnazaaha syt dayta dahanchay ko nafza karnay ka ayk tarykha yeh hay keh hr syt ki nmaindghy kesi lnkda fharst kay zaryaha ki jaiay۔syt main hr ansar ayk mnslk fharst main hawta hay aur is main syt main aghlay ansar ka ayk pwaintr aur syt kay nmainday ka dusra pwaintr hawta haay۔mtnazaaha syt dayta dahanchay ko nafza karnay ka ayk aur tarykha yeh hay keh jrawn waly drkhtwn kay zaryaha sytwn ki nmaindghy ki jaye ، js main hr nwda main ayk ansar hawta hay aur hr drkht ayk syt ki nmaindghy krta haay۔har ansar sirf apnay waldyn ki taraf asharha krta hay ، aur hr drkht ki jra is syt aur is kay apnay waldyn ka nmaindha hawty haay۔ das daysyt syt dayta dahanchha mndrjha zayl karrwaiywn ki hamayt krta haay: myk syt (yw): snghl par mushtamil ayk nya syt tshkyl dyta hay js main snghl par mushtamil ayk nya syt tyar krta haayansar U.FIND (U): is syt kay nmainday ko waps krta hay js main U.union (U ، V) shaml hawta haay: U aur V par mushtamil sytwn ko ayk hi syt main zum krta haay۔ tlash ki aapryshn is bat ka tayn karnay kay liye astamal hawta hay keh ayk khasa ansar kis sab syt haayas main aur is ka tayn karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay keh aya do anasar ayk hi sab syt main hayn۔ywnyn aapryshn ko ayk hi sbsyt main do zayly sytwn main shaml karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ayn das dayspynt syt bnanay ki wkt ki pychydghy O (n) hay ، aur un sytwn par aym fainda aur ywnyn ki karrwaiywn ko anjam denay ki wkt ki pychydghy O (M lagh ayn) hay jo ywnyn baiy rynk aur raha kmpryshn hawrstks daat kam ka astamal karty hoey haay۔ayk naghwar syt dayta dahanchha ayk dayta dahanchha hay jo anasar kay ayk syt par nzar rkhta hay jo mtadd naghwar zayly zakhyrwn main tksym hawta haay۔yha aapryshnwn ki hamayt krta hay jesay niay syt shaml karna ، naghwar sytwn ko zum karna ، kesi naghwar syt kay nmainday ko tlash karna ، aur janch pratal karna keh aya do syt naghwar hain ya nhayn۔naghwar syt dayta dahanchha un msail ko hal karnay main karaamd hay js main ayk syt ko napsndydha zayly sytwn main tksym karna aur un sab sytwn par kam anjam dena shaml haay۔as ko lnkda lstwn ya jrawn waly drkhtwn ka astamal karty hoey nafza kya jaskta hay ، aur un sytwn par aapryshn karnay ki wkt ki pychydghy O (M lagh ayn) ywnyn baiy rynk aur path kmpryshn ka astamal karty hoey haay۔

Question: rydaks trtyb waly alghwrthm ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: rydaks trtyb ayk ghair tkwyt par mbny chhantnay wala alghwrthm hay jo anfrady handswn kay zaryaha chabyan ghrwp krkay antyjr kyza kay sath aadad wa shmar ko trtyb dyta hay jo ayk hi aham pwzayshn aur kdr (jghha ki kymt) ka ashtrak karty hayn۔rydaks trtyb nmbrwn ki ayk saf ko trtyb denay kay liye ghnty trtyb ko sbrwtain kay tawr par astamal krta haay۔alghwrthm anasar ko mtadd paswn main prwsysngh krkay ، handsay kay zaryaha handsay ki trtyb dyta hay ، js sy kam sy kam aham handswn (ayl ays day) sy la kar anthaaiy aham handswn (aym ays day) ya is kay braks shrwa hawta haay۔ayk hi jghha ki kymt kay handswn ko trtyb denay kay liye rydaks trtyb mkhtlf chhantnay waly alghwrthm ko shaml krskta haay۔rydaks trtyb O (d*(n+b)) wkt main chlta hay ، jahan D handswn ki tadad hay ، n anasar ki tadad hay ، aur B anasar ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal hony waly nmbr kay nzaam ki bnyad haay۔ bnyady khyal ka bnyady khyalrydaks trtyb anasar ko un kay handswn kay zaryaha trtyb dena hay ، kam sy kam aham handsay sy la kar anthaaiy aham handsay tak shrwa hawta haay۔har pas main ، anasar ko mwjwdha handsay ki kymt ki bnyad par baltywn main trtyb diya jata hay ، aur phir trtyb shuda fharst ki tshkyl kay l the baltywn ko mthark kya jata haay۔alghwrthm hr handsay kay l this is aml ko dharata hay jab tak keh tamam handswn par ghwr nah kya jaiay۔RADIX SORT LSD Radix Sort ya MSD Radix trtyb ka astamal karty hoey nafza kya jaskta haay۔ayl ays day rydaks trtyb sy kam sy kam aham handsay sy chhantna shrwa hawta hay aur isi jghha ki kymt kay handswn ko trtyb denay kay liye ayk msthakm chhantnay waly alghwrthm ko sbrwtain kay tawr par astamal krta haay۔aym ays day rydaks trtyb anthaaiy aham handsay sy chhantna shrwa krta hay aur isi jghha ki kymt kay handswn ko trtyb denay kay liye balty trtyb ko bar bar anjam dyta haay۔ yahan azaghr main ayl ays day rydaks trtyb ka ayk msaal haay: paiythndaf rydaks_swrt_l ays day (aay aar aar)= 1 jabky myks_ wylyw // ayksp> 0: baltyan = [[] _ kay liye _ main had (10)] nmbr kay liye nmbr: handsha = (nmbr // ayksp) ٪ 10 balty [handsha]balty main balty main balty kay liye nmbr] Exp *= 10 rytrn ayrn is nfaza ko ، Radix_sort_lsd () fnkshn un pt kymt tlash karnay sy shrwa hawta haay۔as kay bad yeh hr handsay par tkrar krta hay ، kam sy kam aham handsay sy shrwa hawta hay ، aur mwjwdha handsay ki kdr ki bnyad par anasar ko baltywn main trtyb denay kay liye balty trtyb ka astamal krta haay۔aakhr main ، fnkshn trtyb shuda fharst ki tshkyl kay l the baltywn ko hum aahangh krta haay۔ msaal kay tawr par ، mndrjha zayl kwda ayl ays day rydaks klydwn ko ghrwp krkay chabyan jo ayk hi aham pwzayshn aur kymt (jghha ki kymt) ka ashtrak krty hayn۔yha anasar ko mtadd paswn main prwsysngh krkay ، handsay kay zaryaha handsay ko trtyb dyta hay ، kam
