Question: by+ drkht kay dayta dahanchay ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: ayk by+ drkht mtwazan drkhtwn kay aadad wa shmar ka dahanchha hay jo by try ki twsya haay۔yha aam tawr par dayta bys sstm aur fail sstm main astamal hawta hay takha bray mkdar main dayta ko mwsar andaza main astwr aur bazayaft kya jaskay۔A B+ drkht jra nwda ، andrwny nwdas aur pty kay nwdas par mushtamil hawta haay۔jra ka nwda ya tou pty ya do ya zayada bchwn kay sath nwda hawskta haay۔by+ drkht main hr nwda main sirf chabyan hawty hain (klydy kdr kay jwraay nhayn) ، aur js main mnslk ptay kay sath nechay ayk azuafy staha shaml ki jati haay۔by+ drkht ki chabyan chrahtay hoey trtyb main trtyb di jati hain ، aur andrwny nwda main hr klyd ayk zayly try sy msawy hawty hay js main klyd sy zayada ya is kay brabr tamam chabyan hawty hain aur aghly klyd sy kam hawty hayn۔by+ try kay pty nwdas main asal aadad wa shmar mwjwd hain ، aur rykarda ko srch fylda par aardarda rsaiy fraham karnay kay liye ayk dusray kay sath jraay hoey hayn۔by+ try ayk ksayr stahay dayta dahanchha hay ، js main upar ki jra nwda aur is kay nechay andrwny nwdas ki ayk ya zayada staha haay۔nychay ki staha par pty kay nwdas main asal aadad wa shmar hawtay hayn۔by+ try bhatr dakhl karnay ، hazaf karnay ، aur by try par tlash karnay ki hamayt krta hay ، aur andrwny nwdas kay sath sath pty kay nwdas main dayta pwaintrza aur klydy akdar dono ki ajazat dyta hay ، js sy tlash ، dakhl karain aur aapryshnwn ko zayada mwsar bnaiyn۔by+ try mrkzay mymwry main bray mkdar main dayta ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye ayk mfyd dayta dahanchha hay ، jahan mrkzay mymwry ka saiza atna braa nahin haay۔

Question: dayta dahanchha kya haay؟
Answer: dayta ka dahanchha dayta ko mnzam karnay ، prwsysngh ، bazayaft aur dayta ko astwr karnay kay liye ayk khsawsay shkl haay۔yha kmpywtr par dayta ka ahatmam karnay ka ayk tarykha hay takha is tak rsaiy aur mwsar andaza main ap dayt hawskay۔aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay ki mtadd bnyady aur aaly drjay ki aksam hain ، yeh sab ayk khasa mksad kay mtaabk dayta ka bndwbst karnay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya haay۔dayta dahanchay saarfyn kay liye mnasb tarykwn sy un ki zurwrt kay aadad wa shmar tak rsaiy aur kam karna aasan bnatay hayn۔sb sy aham bat yeh hay keh dayta kay dahanchay malwmat ki tnzaym ko tyar karty hain takha mshynyn aur ansan isy bhatr tawr par smjh skyn۔kmpywtr sains aur kmpywtr prwghramngh main ، dayta ka dahanchha mntkhb ya mkhtlf alghwrthm kay sath astamal karnay kay mksad kay liye dayta astwr karnay kay liye dayzaain kya jaskta haay۔kchh maamlat main ، alghwrthm ki bnyady karwaiyan dayta dahanchay kay dayzaain kay sath mzubwtay sy mil jati hayn۔har aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay main dayta ki akdar ، dayta kay mabyn talkat kay baray main malwmat hawty hain ، aur - kuch maamlat main - aysay afaal jo aadad wa shmar par laghw hawsktay hayn۔aam bys dayta ki aksam ، jesay antyjrza ya flwtngh pwaint akdar ، jo zayada tr kmpywtr prwghramngh zabanwn main dstyab hain zayada pychydha dayta dahanchay bnanay kay liye astamal ki jaskty hayn۔dayta dahanchay ko tkryba every hr prwghram ya saft wyir sstm main astamal kya jata hay jo tyar kya gaya haay۔lkyry dayta dahanchay aur ghair lkyry dayta dahanchay dayta dahanchay ki do aham aksam hayn۔lkyry dayta dahanchay woh hain jn main anasar ko ayk kay bad ayk trtyb main trtyb diya jata hay ، jabky ghair lkyry dayta dahanchay woh hain jn main anasar ko dusray kay bad trtyb main trtyb nahin diya jata haay۔

Question: ayk saf aur mnslk fharst main kya frk haay؟
Answer: safwn aur mnslk fharstyn dayta ko astwr aur mnzam karnay kay liye astamal hony waly do bnyady aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay hayn۔dwnwn kay mabyn kuch akhtlafat yeh hayn: mymwry ki mkhtsa: aarywn ko mymwry kay mtzuad mkamat par astwr anasar astwr karty hain ، jabky lnkda fharstyn ghair mtzuad mymwry kay mkamat par astwr anasar ko astwr krty hayn۔as ka mtalb yeh hay keh safwn ko mkhtsa karnay kay liye ayk mkrrha mkdar main mymwry ki zurwrt hawty hay ، yahan tak keh agar yeh sab astamal nahin kya jarhaa hay ، jabky mnslk fharstyn aadad wa shmar ki mkdar kay tnasb sy apnay saiza ko mrhalha war braha sakti hayn۔srny ko braha rast is kay andayks sy haasal kya jaskta hay ، jo lnkda fharst kay mkablay main ayk saf main anasar tak rsaiy ko tyza tr bnata haay۔taham ، kesi mnslk fharst ki sawrt main ، kesi bhi ansar tak phanchnay kay liye pchhlay tamam anasar ko abwr karna chahaiay۔ dakhl aur hazaf krna: kesi saf main anasar ka andraj aur hazaf karna wkt talb hawskta hay ، khasa tawr par agar saf bray hay ، kywnkha tamam tmamandraj ya hazaf karnay kay bad anasar ko mntkl karna zurwry haay۔as kay braks ، lnkda lst main anasar ka andraj aur hazaf karna tyza hay kywnkha sirf pwaintrza ko ap dayt karnay ki zurwrt haay۔ mymwry ka astamal: safwn ko mymwry ki ayk mkrrha mkdar main mkhtsa karnay ki zurwrt hawty hay ، chahaay yeh sab astamal nah ho ، jabky lnkda fharstynaadad wa shmar ki mkdar kay tnasb sy mrhalha war un kay saiza main azuafha krskta haay۔as ka mtalb yeh hay keh lnkda fharstyn kuch maamlat main safwn kay mkablay main zayada mymwry sy mwsar hawskty hayn۔ nfaza: safwn ko nafza karna aur astamal karna aasan hay ، jabky lnkda fharstwn ko nafza karnay aur astamal karnay kay liye mazeed kam ki zurwrt hawty haay۔mnslk fharstyn syghmnttyshn falt ya mymwry lyk ki ghltaywn ka zayada khtarha hayn۔ khlasaha main ، safwn aur lnkda fharstyn aadad wa shmar ko zakhyrha karnay aur mnzam karnay kay liye mfyd dayta dahanchay hain ، lekin un kay mkhtlf fwaid aur nksaanat hayn۔anasar tak rsaiy haasal karnay kay liye safyn tyza hain ، jabky mnslk fharstyn anasar kay andraj aur hazaf karnay kay liye tyza hayn۔safwn ko mkhtsa karnay kay liye ayk mkrrha mkdar main mymwry ki zurwrt hawty hay ، jabky lnkda fharstyn aadad wa shmar ki mkdar kay tnasb sy mrhalha war apnay saiza main azuafha krskty hayn۔safwn aur mnslk fharstwn kay mabyn antkhab ka anhasaar mkhsawsa astamal kay maamlay aur rsaiy kay wkt ، andraj aur hazaf wkt kay darmiyan tjarty talkat par hawta haay۔

Question: astyk kya haay؟as ki ayk msaal dyn keh isy kis tarah astamal kya jaskta haay۔
Answer: ayk astyk ayk lkyry dayta dahanchha hay jo LIFO (aakhry main aakhry myn) asawl ki pyrwy krta haay۔yha ayk aasan dayta dahanchha hay jo anasar ko kesi khasa trtyb main shaml karnay aur isy hatanay ki ajazat dyta haay۔astyk ka ayk sr hay ، jabky ktaar kay do sray (samnay aur pychhay) hayn۔as main astyk kay sab sy upar waly ansar ki taraf asharha karnay waly sirf ayk pwaintr tap hawta haay۔jb bhi kesi ansar ko astyk main shaml kya jata hay tou ، isy astyk kay awpry hasaay main shaml kya jata hay ، aur ansar ko sirf astyk sy hazaf kya jaskta haay۔astyks ko bohat sari ayply kyshnza main astamal kya jata hay ، jesay tykst aydaytrza main anzumam/rydaw aapryshnza ، byk trykngh alghwrthm ، aur azahaar ki tshkhysa۔ is ki ayk msaal hay keh kesi lfza ko alta karnay kay liye astyk ko kis tarah astamal kya jaskta haay۔ham ayk dyiay gaye lfza ko astyk - khta kay zaryaha khta - aur phir astyk sy pap lytrza par dhkyl saktay hayn۔as kay ntyjay main lfza alt hawjaiay gha۔msaal kay tawr par ، hum kehty hain keh hum lfza "haylw" ko pltna chahti hayn۔ham lfza kay hr khta ko astyk par dhkyl saktay hain ، aur phir alt lfza ko haasal karnay kay liye un ko alt trtyb main band kar saktay hayn: azaghr kay lfza kay l letter pyr kay liay: astyk.aypynda (khta) alt_ wrda = ""jbkha astyk: alt_ wrda += astyk ۔pp () prnt (alt_ wrda) is ki pydawar hawghy: awlyha is msaal kay tawr par ، hum pehlay astyk par "haylw" kay lfza kay hr khta ko aaghay brahatay hain ، aur phir un ko alta karnay kay liye alt trtyb main pap krynlfza "awlyha". akhttam par ، ayk astyk ayk sadha dayta dahanchha hay jo anasar ko kesi khasa trtyb main shaml karnay aur isy hatanay ki ajazat dyta haay۔yha LIFO (aakhry main aakhry myn) asawl ki pyrwy krta hay aur bohat sy ayply kyshnza main astamal hawta hay ، jesay tykst aydaytrza main kaladm/rydaw aapryshnza ، byk trykngh alghwrthm ، aur azahaar ki tshkhysa۔ham astyk par lfza kay hr harf ko astyk par dhkyl kar aur phir un ko rywrs aardar main pap karty hoey ayk lfza ko pltanay kay liye ayk astyk ka astamal krsktay hayn۔

Question: ktaar kya haay؟as ki ayk msaal dyn keh isy kis tarah astamal kya jaskta haay۔
Answer: ayk ktaar ayk lkyry dayta dahanchha hay jo FIFO (phalay main phalay) asawl ki pyrwy krta haay۔yha ashyaa ka ayk kntynr hay jo FIFO asawl kay mtaabk dakhl aur hata diya jata haay۔ayk ktaar kay do sray hawtay hain ، samnay aur akby ، aur niay anasar ko akby sray main shaml kya jata hay aur samnay kay sray sy hata diya jata haay۔ktaaryn bohat sy ayply kyshnza main astamal hawty hain ، jesay mlazamt ka shydawlngh ، nyt wrk pykt rwtngh ، aur chwraaiy ki pehli tlash alghwrthm۔ yahan prntr ktaar ko nafza karnay kay liye ktaar ko kis tarah astamal kya jaskta hay is ki ayk msaal haay۔frzu karain keh hamary pas ayk prntr hay jo ayk wkt main ayk dstawyza prnt krskta hay ، aur mtadd saarfyn apnay dstawyzaat prnt karna chahti hayn۔ham prntngh ki drkhwastwn ko snbhalnay kay liye ktaar astamal krsktay hayn۔har bar jab koi saarf kesi dstawyza ko prnt karna chahta hay tou ، hum dstawyza ko ktaar kay akby sray main shaml krsktay hayn۔as kay bad prntr dstawyza ko ktaar kay aghlay sray sy hata sakta hay aur isy prnt krskta haay۔as sy yeh ykyny bnta hay keh dstawyzaat ko is trtyb main prnt kya gaya hay js ki un ki drkhwast ki hogi thi ، is kay bad un ki drkhwast ki hogi thy۔dayf prnt_dawkywmnt (khwd): agar khud nhayn۔ kywiw: prnt ("prnt karnay kay liye koi dstawyzaat nhayn") dwsry: dstawyza = sylf۔ kywiw.pp (0) prnt ("prntngh dstawyza:" ، dstawyza) prntr_kyw = prntrkyw () prntr_kyw۔add_docament ("dstawyza 1") printer_queue.add_docament ("dstawyza 2") prntr_kyw.ayda_dawkywmnt ("dstawyza 3") prntr_kyw. prnt_dawkywmnt () prntr_kyw ay day prnt: prnt: prnt: prnt_kyw ayw۔dstawyza: dstawyza 1 prntngh dstawyza: dstawyza 2 prntngh dstawyza: dstawyzaat 3NO dstawyzaat ko prnt karnay kay liye is msaal kay tawr par ، hum pehlay ayk prntrwkyw klas bnatay hain js main dstawyzaat ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye dakhly fharst hawty haay۔as kay bad hum ADD_DOCAMENT () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ktaar main tyn dstawyzaat shaml karty hain ، aur un ko prnt_Docament () tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey prnt karty hayn۔prnt_Docament () ka tarykha py aw py (0) kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ktaar kay aghlay sray sy dstawyza ko hata dyta hay aur isy prnt krta haay۔aghr ktaar main koi dstawyzaat nahin hain tou ، yeh ayk pygham prnt krta hay js main "prnt karnay kay liye koi dstawyzaat nhayn" kaha jata haay۔ akhttam par ، ayk ktaar ayk lkyry dayta dahanchha hay jo FIFO asawl ki pyrwy krta haay۔yha bohat sy ayply kyshnza main astamal hawta hay ، jesay mlazamt ka nzaam alawkat ، nyt wrk pykt rwtngh ، aur chwraaiy pehli tlash alghwrthm۔ham ktaar kay akby sray par dstawyzaat shaml krkay aur ktaar kay aghlay sray sy un ki drkhwast ki janay wali ktaar kay aghlay sray sy hatanay kay liye ayk ktaar ka astamal krsktay hayn۔

Question: bainry drkht kya haay؟
Answer: bainry try ayk drkht kay aadad wa shmar ka dahanchha hay js main hr nwda main zayada sy zayada do bchay hawsktay hayn۔bainry drkht ka hr nwda tyn aaitmza par mushtamil hawta haay: ayk dayta aaitm ، baien bchay ka ptha ، aur dien bchay ka ptha۔ayk bainry drkht ayk bar bar aadad wa shmar ka dahanchha hawta hay ، js ka mtalb hay keh drkht main hr nwda ko sab try ki jra smjha jaskta haay۔bainry kay drkht bohat sy ayply kyshnza main astamal hawtay hain ، jesay alghwrthm ki tlash aur chhantna ، azahaar ki tshkhysa ، aur fail sstm۔ bainry drkhtwn ki mtadd aksam hain ، jn main shaml hayn: mkml bainry try: ayk mkml bainry drkht ayk khasa ksm ka bainry drkht hay js main hr ayk mynwaldyn nwda/andrwny nwda main ya tou do ya koi bchay nahin hawtay hayn۔: ayk mkml bainry drkht balkl ayk mkml bainry drkht ki tarah hay ، lekin do braay akhtlafat kay sath - hr staha ko mkml tawr par pُr hona chahaiay ، aur pty kay tamam anasar ko baien taraf jhkna hawgha۔ bainry drkhtwn ko nwda dahanchay ka astamal karty hoey nafza kya jaskta hay js main ayk klyd hawty haay۔، ayk baien chailda pwaintr ، aur dien chailda pwaintr۔klyd nwda main zakhyrha shuda kdr hay ، aur baien aur dien chailda pwaintrza baltrtyb nwda kay baien aur dien sbtryza ki taraf asharha karty hayn۔ yahan azaghr main bainry drkhtwn kay nfaza ki ayk msaal haay: azaghrklas nwda: dayf __init __ (khwd ، ، khud ،klydy): self.key = key self.left = koi bhi nhayn۔ khud nhaynrwt. lyft = nwda (2) rwt۔ rait = nwda (3) rwt. lyft.lyft = nwda (4) rwt۔ lyft۔ rait = nwda (5) andardar_trawrsl (jra) is ki pydawar hawghy: 42513 main ، hum pehlay ، hum sab sy pehlay ، hum pehlay hon ghay۔ayk nwda klas ki wzuahat karain jo bainry drkht main nwda ki nmaindghy krta haay۔har nwda main ayk klyd ، baien bchay ka pwaintr ، aur dien chailda pwaintr hawta haay۔as kay bad hum ayk andarwr_trawrsl () fnkshn ki wzuahat karty hain jo bainry drkht ka ayk un aardar trawrsl anjam dyta hay ، js ka mtalb hay keh yeh baien sab try ، phir jra aur phir dien sab try ka dwrha krta haay۔aakhr main ، hum panch nwdas kay sath ayk bainry drkht bnatay hain aur drkht ka ayk andarwr trawrsl karty hayn۔ akhttam par ، ayk bainry try ayk drkht ka dayta dahanchha hay js main hr nwda zayada sy zayada do bchwn main hawskta haay۔bainry kay drkht bohat sy ayply kyshnza main astamal hawtay hain ، jesay alghwrthm ki tlash aur chhantna ، azahaar ki tshkhysa ، aur fail sstm۔bainry drkhtwn ki mtadd aksam hain ، jn main mkml bainry drkht ، kaml bainry drkht ، aur bainry kay mkml drkht shaml hayn۔bainry drkhtwn ko nwda dahanchay ka astamal karty hoey nafza kya jaskta hay js main klyd ، baien chailda pwaintr ، aur dien bchay ka pwaintr hawta haay۔

Question: bainry tlash ka drkht kya haay؟
Answer: bainry srch try bainry drkht kay aadad wa shmar ka dahanchha hay js main hr nwda main zayada sy zayada do bchay hawtay hain ، aur nwda kay baien bchay main chabyan hawty hain jo nwda ki klyd sy kam hawty hain ، jabky nwda kay dien bchay main aysy chabyan hawty hain jo is sy zayada hawty hayn۔nwda ki klydbainry srch try ayk nwda par mbny ، ghair lkyry ksm ka dayta dahanchha hay jo aadad wa shmar ko bazayaft ، chhantnay aur tlash karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔asay ayk aardarda bainry try kay nam sy bhi jana jata hay kywnkha is kay nwdas ko ayk khasa trtyb main trtyb diya gaya haay۔bainry srch try alghwrthm ki tlash aur chhantnay kay l data dayta ka ayk mfyd dahanchha hay ، aur yeh bohat sy ayply kyshnza ، jesay dayta bys ، fail sstm ، aur mrtb karnay waly main astamal hawta haay۔ bainry srch try ki kuch khsawsayat hayn: nwda kay baien sab try par mushtamil haay۔sarf chabyan wali nwdas jo nwda ki klyd sy kam hayn۔ nwda kay dien sab try main sirf nwdas hawtay hain jn ki chabyan hawty hain jo nwda ki klyd sy zayada hawty hayn۔ dono nwda kay baien aur dien sbtrywn ko bainry tlash kay drkht bhi hona chahaiay۔ wahan hona zurwry haay۔drkht main koi daplykyt nwdas nhayn۔ yahan azaghr main bainry srch try kay nfaza ki ayk msaal haay: azaghrklas nwda: dayf __init __ (khwd ، klyd): self.key = key self.left = koi bhi nhayn۔klydy): agar jra koi nahin haay: waps nwda (klyd) agar klyd <rwt.ky: rwt.lft = dakhl karain (jra۔ lyft ، klyd) aylf klyd> rwt.ky: rwt۔ rait = dakhl karain (jra۔ rait ، klyd) rwt dayf inorder_traversal (rwt): agar jra: inorder_traversal (rwt. lyft) prnt (rwt.ky) inorder_traversal (rwt. rait) jra = nanyrwt = dakhl karain (jra ، 50) jra = dakhl karain (jra ، 30) jra = dakhl kryn.phalay nwda klas ki wzuahat karain jo bainry srch drkht main nwda ki nmaindghy krta haay۔har nwda main ayk klyd ، baien bchay ka pwaintr ، aur dien chailda pwaintr hawta haay۔as kay bad hum ayk dakhl () fnkshn ki wzuahat karty hain jo bainry srch try main ayk niy klyd dakhl krta haay۔fnkshn niy klyd kay liye mnasb pwzayshn tlash karnay kay liye drkht ko bar bar abwr krta haay۔aakhr main ، hum sat nwdas kay sath ayk bainry srch try tyar karty hain aur drkht ka ayk un aardar trawrsal karty hayn۔ akhttam par ، bainry srch try bainry drkhtwn ka dayta dahanchha hay js main hr nwda main zayada sy zayada do bchay hawtay hain ، aur nwda ka baien bchhaaysy chabyan hain jo nwda ki klyd sy kam hain ، jabky nwda kay dien bchay main chabyan shaml hain jo nwda ki klyd sy zayada hayn۔yha alghwrthm ki tlash aur chhantnay kay liye ayk mfyd dayta dahanchha hay ، aur yeh bohat sy ayply kyshnza main astamal hawta hay ، jesay dayta bys ، fail sstm ، aur mrtb karnay walay۔

Question: haysh tybl kya haay؟
Answer: ayk haysh tybl ayk dayta dahanchha hay jo klydy kdr kay jwraay zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha andayks ki ghnty kay liye haysh fnkshn ka astamal krta hay js main kesi ansar ko dakhl ya tlash kya jaye gha۔ayk achhay haysh fnkshn ka astamal krkay ، hayshngh achhy tarah sy kam kar sakti haay۔makwl mfrwzuwn kay that ، haysh tybl main kesi ansar ki tlash kay liye drkar awsta wkt O (1) haay۔ayk haysh tybl ayk tjrydy dayta ki ksm hay jo akdar kay liye chabyan ka nkshha bnaty haay۔yha bohat sary ksm kay kmpywtr saft wyir main braay pymanay par astamal hawta hay ، khasa tawr par ayswsy aytw arywn ، dayta bys andayksngh ، kychza ، aur syts kay liay۔ aay haysh tybl do braay ajzaaa par mushtamil haay: ayk srny aur ayk haysh fnkshn۔srny ko klydy kdr kay jwraay zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، aur haysh fnkshn srny kay asharyha ki ghnty kay liye astamal hawta hay jahan klydy kymt ki jwray mhafwza hawghy۔haysh fnkshn klyd ko un pt kay tawr par lyta hay aur saf main ayk andayks lwtata haay۔haysh fnkshn ko is tarah dayzaain kya jana chahaiay keh woh srny kay par yksan tawr par chabyan tksym kray۔ haysh tyblza bohat sy ayply kyshnza main astamal hawtay hain ، jn main dayta bys ، srch anjn aur kychngh sstm shaml hayn۔wha mwsar astwryj aur dayta ki bazayaft ki ajazat dytay hain ، js sy woh bohat sy kmpywtr prwghramwn kay liye ayk aham zaryaha bn jatay hayn۔haysh tyblza akdar kay mkml haysh kwdaza ko bhi astwr krsktay hain ، jo askynngh ko ayk balty ko tyza rftar bnatay hayn۔chabyan par msawat kay mkml tyst karnay ki zurwrt nahin hay agar un kay haysh kwda mmasal nahin hayn۔ akhttam par ، ayk haysh tybl ayk dayta dahanchha hay jo klydy kymt kay jwraay ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha andayks ki ghnty kay liye haysh fnkshn ka astamal krta hay js main kesi ansar ko dakhl ya tlash kya jaye gha۔haysh tybl braay pymanay par kmpywtr saft wyir main braay pymanay par astamal hawtay hain ، khasa tawr par ayswsy aytw arywn ، dayta bys andayksngh ، kychza aur syt kay liay۔wha mwsar astwryj aur dayta ki bazayaft ki ajazat dytay hain ، js sy woh bohat sy kmpywtr prwghramwn kay liye ayk aham twl bnatay hayn۔

Question: ayk ghraf kya haay؟
Answer: ayk ghraf ayk ghair lkyry dayta dahanchha hay js main amwdy ka ayk syt hawta hay (jsay nwdas bhi kaha jata haay) aur knarwn par mushtamil hawta hay jo un amwdy ko jwratay hayn۔ashyaa kay mabyn rabtawn kay nyt wrk ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye ayk ghraf ka astamal kya jata haay۔amwdy ashyaa ki nmaindghy karty hain ، aur knaray un kay mabyn rabtawn ki nmaindghy karty hayn۔ghraf ka astamal bohat sy hakyky dnya kay msail ko hal karnay kay liye kya jata hay ، jesay do nkat kay mabyn mkhtsar trien rastha tlash karna ، swshl nyt wrks ki madalngh karna ، aur kmpywtr nyt wrks ki nmaindghy krna۔ ghraf sy mtalk kuch klydy tsawrat hayn: wrtyks: ayk wrtyks ghraf main ayk nwda haay۔yha nyt wrk main kesi shay ya kesi nktaha ki nmaindghy krta haay۔ ayj: ayk knaray do amwdy kay darmiyan talk haay۔yha nyt wrk main do ashyaa ya pwaints kay mabyn talkat ya rabtaay ki nmaindghy krta haay۔ hadayt shuda ghraf: ayk hadayt wala ghraf ayk ghraf hay js main knarwn ki smt hawty haay۔as ka mtalb yeh hay keh knarwn main ayk abtdaiy wrtyks aur ayk akhttamy wrtyks hawta haay۔as ka mtalb yeh hay keh knaray baghair kesi khasa smt kay do amwdy ko jwratay hayn۔ wzan wala ghraf: wzan wala ghraf ayk ghraf hay js main knarwn ka wzan ya un sy wabstha laght hawty haay۔as ka mtalb yeh hay keh knarwn ki ayk kymt hay jo is ayj ko abwr karnay ki kymt ki nmaindghy krty haay۔ ghraf ko mkhtlf tarykwn sy pysh kya jaskta hay ، jesay mlhakha mytrks ، mlhakha fharst ، aur ayj lst۔nmaindghy ka antkhab mkhsawsa astamal kay maamlay aur jghha aur wkt ki pychydghy kay mabyn tjarty talkat par mnhasar hawta haay۔ akhttam par ، ayk ghraf ayk ghair lkyry dayta dahanchha hay js main amwdy aur knarwn ka ayk mjmwaha hawta hay jo un amwdywn ko jwrata haay۔ghraf ko ashyaa kay mabyn rabtawn kay nyt wrk ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay aur bohat sy hakyky dnya kay msail hal karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔ghraf ki nmaindghy mkhtlf tarykwn sy ki jaskty hay ، jesay mlhak mytrks ، mlhakha fharst ، aur ayj ki fharst۔

Question: chwraaiy ki pehli tlash aur ghharaiy ki pehli tlash main kya frk haay؟
Answer: chwraaiy ki pehli tlash (by ayf ays) aur ghharaiy sy pehlay tlash (day ayf ays) do alghwrthm hain jo kesi ghraf ya drkht ko abwr karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔by ayf ays aur day ayf ays kay mabyn kuch akhtlafat yeh hayn: chwraaiy ki pehli tlash: by ayf ays prtwn main mwjwd tamam amwdywn ka dwrha krta hay ، makhza wrtyks sy bahar ki taraf brahta haay۔shrwa hony waly amwdy sy kesi dyiay gaye wrtyks tak mkhtsar trien rastha tlash kryn۔ by ayf ays ki zumant di jati hay keh woh baghair wzan waly ghraf main mkhtsar trien rastha tlash kryn۔ayk hal kay liye drkht۔ daypth frst tlash: dusri shakhwn ko tlash karnay kay liye byk trykngh sy pehlay day ayf ays zayada sy zayada ghhara hawta haay۔ day ayf ays aghlay dwray kay liye amwdy ko tryk rkhnay kay liye astyk ya tkrar ka astamal krta haay۔ day ayf aam tawr par astamal hawta hay jab aap ko tlash karnay ki zurwrt hawty haaypwray try daat day ayf ays ko by ayf ays kay mkablay main tkrar ka astamal karty hoey nafza karna aasan hay aur is main kam ryast ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ day ayf aksar hakyky dnya main khylwn aur khyl jesay haalat main astamal hawta haay۔ khlasaha main ، by ayf ays aur day ayf do alghwrthm hain jo ghraf ko abwr karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hain awrayk drkht.by ayf ays swrs wrtyks sy bahar ki taraf brahtay hoey prtwn main tamam amwdy ka dwrha krta hay ، jabky day ayf ays dusri shakhwn ki tlash kay l back byk trykngh sy pehlay zayada sy zayada ghharaiy main jata haay۔by ayf ays aghlay dwray kay liye amwdy ko tryk rkhnay kay liye ktaar kay dayta dahanchay ka astamal krta hay ، jabky day ayf ays astyk ya tkrar ka astamal krta haay۔by ayf ays ka astamal shrwaaty wrtyks sy kesi dyiay gaye wrtyks tak mkhtsar trien rastha tlash karnay kay liye kya jata hay ، jabky day ayf ays aam tawr par astamal hawta hay jab aap ko poray drkht ko tlash karnay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔

Question: dahyr kya haay؟
Answer: ayk dahyr drkht par mbny ayk khsawsay dayta dahanchha hay jo dayta ko mwsar andaza main zakhyrha karnay aur bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha ayk mkml bainry drkht hay jahan hr nwda ki ayk klyd hawty hay jo (zayadha sy zayada dahyr myn) sy zayada ya is kay brabr hawty hay ya is sy kam ya is kay brabr (ayk mnt kay dahyr myn) apnay bchwn ki chabyan۔hayp praprty is bat ko ykyny bnaty hay keh dahyr ka jra nwda hamyshha hi zayada sy zayada (zayadha sy zayada hayp myn) ya kam sy kam (ayk mnt kay dahyr myn) dahyr main hawta haay۔ aych ay aay py ays bohat sy ayply kyshnza main astamal hawta hay ، jesay alghwrthm ، trjyhay ktaaryn ، awrghraf alghwrthm۔wha anasar ko mwsar dakhl karnay aur hazaf karnay ki ajazat dytay hain ، aur woh dahyr main zayada sy zayada ya kam sy kam ansar ko jldy sy tlash karnay ka ayk tarykha fraham karty hayn۔ do ksm kay dahyr hayn: zayada sy zayada hayp aur mn hayp۔zayadha sy zayada dahyr main ، rwt nwda ki zayada sy zayada klydy kymt hawty hay ، aur bchwn kay tamam nwdas waldyn nwda sy kam ya is kay brabr klydy akdar rkhtay hayn۔ayk mnt kay dahyr main ، rwt nwda ki kam sy kam klydy kymt hawty hay ، aur bchwn kay tamam nwdas waldyn nwda sy zayada ya is kay brabr klydy akdar rkhtay hayn۔ woh sray ya drkht kay aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay ka astamal karty hoey nafza kya jaskta haay۔srny par mbny nfaza main ، dahyr ayk saf main mhafwza kya jata hay ، aur waldyn kay bchwn kay talkat ka tayn saf kay anasar kay asharay sy hawta haay۔drkhtwn par mbny nfaza main ، dahyr ko bainry try kay tawr par mhafwza kya jata hay ، aur waldyn kay bchay kay talkat nwdas kay darmiyan pwaintrza kay zaryaha taay kyay jatay hayn۔ aakhr main ، ayk dahyr drkht par mbny ayk khsawsay dayta dahanchha hay jo astwr kay liye astamal hawta hay awrdayta ko mwsar andaza main bazayaft kryn۔yha ayk mkml bainry drkht hay jahan hr nwda ki ayk klyd hawty hay jo (zayadha sy zayada dahyr myn) sy zayada ya is kay brabr hawty hay ya is sy kam ya is kay brabr (ayk mnt kay dahyr myn) apnay bchwn ki chabyan۔dahyr bohat sy ayply kyshnza main astamal hawtay hain ، jesay alghwrthm ، trjyhay ktaar aur ghraf alghwrthm ko chhantna۔an ko srny ya drkht kay aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay ka astamal karty hoey nafza kya jaskta haay۔

Question: zayada sy zayada dahyr aur ayk mnt kay dahyr kay darmiyan frk ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: dahyr drkht par mbny dayta dahanchha hay jo mstkl wkt main drkht main kam sy kam aur zayada sy zayada ansar tak rsaiy ki ajazat dyta haay۔dahyrwn ki do aksam hayn: kam sy kam aur zayada sy zayada hayp۔ayk mnt kay dahyr aur zayada sy zayada dahyr kay darmiyan bnyady frk woh trtyb hay js main anasar ka ahatmam kya jata haay۔ayk mnt kay dahyr main ، jra nwda main kam sy kam klydy ansar hawta hay ، jabky zayada sy zayada dahyr main ، jra nwda main zayada sy zayada klydy ansar hawta haay۔yhaan ayk mnt kay dahyr aur zayada sy zayada dahyr kay darmiyan kuch klydy akhtlafat hayn: mn dahyr: bchwn kay nwdas kay mkablay main jra ya waldyn ka nwda aam tawr par kdr main kam hawta haay۔ kam sy kam klydy ansar jra nwda par mwjwd haay۔ sab sy chhwta ansar tak rsaiy haasal haay۔mstkl wkt kay andr chwnkha yeh andayks par hay 1. aay mnt hayp ko dahyr main kam sy kam ansar tak rsaiy haasal karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ myks hayp: bchwn kay nwdas kay mkablay main jra ya waldyn ka nwda aam tawr par kdr main zayada hawta haay۔ zayada sy zayada klydy ansar mwjwd haayrwt nwda pr۔ sab sy braay ansar ko mstkl wkt kay andr haasal kya jata hay kywnkha yeh andayks 1. par haay۔ ayk zayada sy zayada hayp dahyr main zayada sy zayada ansar tak rsaiy haasal karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ do mnt hayp aur myks hayp kay apnay fwaid aur nksaanat hayn۔jb aap ko dahyr main sab sy chhwta ansar tlash karnay ki zurwrt hawty hay tou ayk mnt ka dahyr mfyd hawta hay ، jab keh jab aap ko dahyr main sab sy braa ansar tlash karnay ki zurwrt hawty hay tou zayada sy zayada dahyr mfyd hawta haay۔js ka antkhab astamal karnay kay liye hay is ka anhasaar mkhsawsa astamal kay maamlay aur ayply kyshn ki zurwryat par hawta haay۔ akhttam par ، dahyr drkht par mbny dayta dahanchha hay jo mstkl wkt main drkht main kam sy kam aur zayada sy zayada ansar tak rsaiy ki ajazat dyta haay۔dahyrwn ki do aksam hayn: kam sy kam aur zayada sy zayada hayp۔ayk mnt kay dahyr aur zayada sy zayada dahyr kay darmiyan bnyady frk woh trtyb hay js main anasar ka ahatmam kya jata haay۔dahyr main kam sy kam ansar tak rsaiy kay liye ayk mnt ka dahyr astamal kya jata hay ، jabky dahyr main zayada sy zayada ansar tak rsaiy kay liye ayk zayada sy zayada dahyr astamal kya jata haay۔js ka antkhab astamal karna hay is ka anhasaar mkhsawsa astamal kay maamlay aur drkhwast ki zurwryat par hawta haay۔

Question: trjyhay ktaar kya haay؟
Answer: trjyhay ktaar ktaar ki ayk ksm hay jo un ki trjyhay akdar ki bnyad par anasar ka ahatmam krty haay۔aaly trjyhay akdar waly anasar ko aam tawr par kam trjyhay akdar waly anasar sy pehlay bazayaft kya jata haay۔trjyhay ktaar main ، hr ansar trjyhay kymt sy wabstha hawta hay ، aur anasar ko un ki trjyha ki bnyad par pysh kya jata haay۔trjyhay ktaar mndrjha zayl khsawsayat kay sath ktaar kay aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay ki twsya haay: hr shay ki is sy wabstha trjyha hawty haay۔ aaly trjyha kay haaml ansar ko kam trjyha kay haaml ansar sy pehlay hi is ki trjyha di jati haay۔ agar do anasar ayk hi trjyha rkhtay hain tou ، un ki khdmt ki jati haay۔ktaar main un kay aardar kay mtaabk۔ trjyhay ktaar ko nafza karnay kay mtadd tarykay hain ، bshmwl ayk saf ، mnslk fharst ، dahyr ، ya bainry srch try ka astamal۔har tarykha kar kay apnay fwaid aur nksaanat hawtay hain ، aur bhatryn antkhab aap ki drkhwast ki mkhsawsa zurwryat par mnhasar hawgha۔ prywryty ktaaryn aksar ryil taim sstm main astamal hawty hain ، jahan js trtyb main anasar par karrwaiy ki jati hay is kay aham ntaij braamd hawsktay hayn۔an ki afadyt ko bhatr bnanay kay liye alghwrthm main bhi astamal kya jata hay ، jesay ghraf main mkhtsar trien rastha tlash karnay kay liye dayjkstra kay alghwrthm aur path faindangh kay liay* tlash alghwrthm۔akdar۔aaly trjyhay akdar waly anasar ko aam tawr par kam trjyhay akdar waly anasar sy pehlay bazayaft kya jata haay۔trjyhay ktaaryn bohat sy ayply kyshnza main astamal ki jati hain ، jesay un ki afadyt ko bhatr bnanay kay liye ryil taim sstm aur alghwrthm۔trjyhay ktaar ko nafza karnay kay bohat sary tarykay hain ، aur bhatryn antkhab aap ki drkhwast ki mkhsawsa zurwryat par mnhasar hawgha۔

Question: ayk try kya haay؟
Answer: ayk traiy ، jsay ayk sabkha drkht ya dayjytl drkht bhi kaha jata hay ، drkht par mbny dayta dahanchha hay jo dayta kay ayk syt main tarwn ko mwsar andaza main astwr karnay aur tlash karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔nam "try" lfza "bazayaft" sy aya hay ، jo is kay tarwn ko mwsar andaza main bazayaft karnay kay bnyady atalak ki akasy krta haay۔ayk try shakhwn kay zaryaha mnslk nwdas par mushtamil hay ، hr ayk tar main ayk hi krdar ki nmaindghy krta haay۔rwt nwda aam tawr par khaly hawta hay ya is ki ayk khasa kymt hawty hay ، jabky pty kay nwdas tar kay akhttam ki nshandhay karty hayn۔jb hum jra kay nwda sy ptay kay nwda tak jatay hain tou ، hum hr nwda kay zaryaha pysh krdha krdarwn ko hum aahangh krkay tar tyar karty hayn۔ yahan ayk try ki kuch aham khsawsayat hayn: ayk traiy main hr nwda ayk tar main ayk krdar ki nmaindghy krta haay۔ jra nwda nmaindghy krta haay۔ayk khaly tar۔ pty kay nwdas tar kay akhttam ki nmaindghy karty hayn۔ rwt nwda sy pty nwda tak ka rastha ayk tar ki nmaindghy krta haay۔ syrtyn aksar tlash aur aatw tkmyl jesay kamwn main astamal hawty hain ، jahan tar kay ayk braay daytasyt ki zurwrt hawty haay۔mwsar andaza main zakhyrha ، janch pratal ، ya tlash ki ja .۔ dyghr aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay ، jesay haysh tyblza aur bainry tlash kay drkhtwn kay mkablay main kiy fwaid hayn۔wha mwsar sabkha tlashywn ki ajazat dytay hain ، js ka mtalb hay keh aap try main mwjwd tamam dawrwn ko jldy sy tlash krsktay hain jo kesi dyiay gaye sabkha sy shrwa hawtay hayn۔kwshshyn haysh tyblza kay mkablay main kam mymwry ka astamal bhi krty hain ، aur woh kuch kamwn kay liye bainry tlash kay drkhtwn sy tyza tr hawskty hayn۔ akhttam par ، ayk try ayk drkht par mbny dayta dahanchha hay jo dayta kay ayk syt main tarwn ko mwsar andaza main astwr karnay aur tlash karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔as main shakhwn kay zaryaha mnslk nwdas shaml hain ، hr ayk tar main ayk hi krdar ki nmaindghy krta haay۔kwshshwn ko aksar tlash aur aatw tkmyl jesay kamwn main astamal kya jata hay ، jahan tarwn kay ayk braay daytasyt ko mwsar andaza main zakhyrha karnay ، janch pratal karnay ya tlash karnay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔kwshshwn kay dyghr aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay par kiy fwaid hain ، jesay haysh tyblza aur bainry tlash kay drkht۔

Question: srkh syaha drkht kya haay؟
Answer: ayk srkh rngh ka drkht ayk khud mtwazan bainry srch drkht hay js ki ayjad 1972 main rwdawlf bayr nay ki thi js nay isy "twazan bainry by try" kaha tha۔yha bainry srch try ki ayk shkl hay aur is ki karrwaiywn kay liye isi tarah ki pychydghy ki zumant dyta hay aur tlash ، andraj aur hazaf karnay kay tawr par astamal karnay kay liye mwsar haay۔yha sab O (lagh an) wkt main kya jaskta hay ، jahan drkht main nwdas ki tadad haay۔ayk srkh rngh ka drkht ayk bainry tlash ka drkht hay js main hr nwda ka rngh hawta hay jo srkh ya syaha hawta haay۔jra nwda hamyshha syaha hawta hay ، aur hr pty nwda syaha hawta haay۔har srkh nwda main is kay dono bchwn ko rnghyn rngh ka rngh hawta hay ، aur is main koi do mlhakha srkh nwdas nahin hayn۔jra sy pty nwda tak hr rastay main ayk hi tadad main syaha nwdas hawtay hayn۔srkh rngh kay drkht ka mksad mtwazan rhana hay ، jo is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh is ki mshtrkha karwaiyan ، jesay tlash aur hazaf karain ، kabhi bhi O (n*lagh (N)) sy bhi bdtr nahin hawta haay۔bainry srch drkht ko srkh syaha drkht main tbdyl karnay kay liye drkar tbdylyan skhty sy azuafy hayn۔as ka mtalb yeh hay keh ، ayk srkh rngh ka drkht ayk mayary bainry srch drkht hay jo azuafy hamlha aawrwn ko brkrar rkhta haay۔srkh syaha drkht bohat sy ayply kyshnza main astamal hawtay hain ، jesay dayta bys ، mrtb karnay waly ، aur aaprytngh sstmza۔

Question: by try kya haay؟
Answer: by try ayk khud twazan rkhnay wala drkhtwn ka dayta dahanchha hay jo bray mkdar main dayta ko mwsar andaza main zakhyrha karnay aur bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha bainry srch try ki aam kary hay js main hr nwda kay do sy zayada bchay hawsktay hayn۔by try ko dayta ko bazayaft ya trmym karnay kay liye drkar dask tak rsaiy ki tadad ko kam sy kam karnay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya hay ، js sy yeh dayta bys aur fail sstm main astamal kay l well mnasb haay۔by try ki kuch aham khsawsayat yeh hayn: ayk by try ayk khud twazan rkhnay waly drkhtwn kay aadad wa shmar ka dahanchha hay jo trtyb shuda dayta ko brkrar rkhta hay aur tlash ، trtyb tak rsaiy ، azuafay aur hazaf hony ki ajazat dyta haay۔bainry srch try ، do sy zayada bchwn kay sath nwdas ki ajazat dyta haay۔ ayk by try astwryj sstm kay l well mnasb hay jo dayta kay nsbta large braay blaks ، jesay dayta bys aur fail sstm ko prahta aur lkhta haay۔ aardar aym ka by try aym haay۔ayk drkht js main hr nwda main zayada tr aym bchwn aur kam aza kam aym/2 bchay hawtay hayn۔ ayk by try mtwazan hay ، js ka mtalb hay keh drkht ki awnchaiy chhwty rakhi jati hay ، is bat ko ykyny bnatay hoey keh dask tak rsaiy ki tadad bazayaft ya is main trmym karnay kay liye drkar haaydayta ko kam sy kam kya jata haay۔ by tyrza bohat sy ayply kyshnza main astamal hawtay hain ، jesay dayta bys ، fail sstm ، aur srch anjn۔wha dayta ko bazayaft karnay ya is main trmym karnay kay liye drkar dask tak rsaiy ki tadad ko kam sy kam karnay kay liye dayzaain kyay gaye hain ، js sy woh un ayply kyshnza main astamal kay l well mnasb hain jn main bray mkdar main dayta tak tyza rsaiy ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ akhttam par ، by try khud twazan drkht ka dayta haay۔dahanchha jo bray mkdar main dayta ko mwsar andaza main zakhyrha karnay aur bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha bainry srch try ki aam kary hay js main hr nwda kay do sy zayada bchay hawsktay hayn۔by trywn ko bohat sy ayply kyshnza main astamal kya jata hay ، jesay dayta bys ، fail sstm ، aur srch anjn۔wha dayta ko bazayaft karnay ya is main trmym karnay kay liye drkar dask tak rsaiy ki tadad ko kam sy kam karnay kay liye dayzaain kyay gaye hain ، js sy woh un ayply kyshnza main astamal kay l well mnasb hain jn main dayta ki bray mkdar main tyzay sy rsaiy ki zurwrt hawty haay۔

Question: tabkha ka drkht kya haay؟
Answer: ayk tabkha ka drkht drkht par mbny dayta dahanchha hay jo kesi saf main mtadd rynj kay swalat ka mwsar andaza main jwab denay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔as sy hamain kesi ansar ya alamty wkt main kesi ansar ki jghha la kar saf main trmym karnay ki ajazat mlty haay۔ayk tabkha ka drkht ayk bainry drkht hawta hay js main hr nwda ayk had kay baray main malwmat mhafwza krta hay ، jo msilay par mnhasar hawta haay۔aam tawr par ، ayk tabkha ka drkht ayk bohat hi lchkdar dayta dahanchha hay ، aur is kay sath bohat sari pryshanywn ko hal kya jaskta haay۔yhaan ayk tabkha kay drkht ki kuch aham khsawsayat hayn: ayk tabkha ka drkht bainry drkht kay aadad wa shmar ka dahanchha hawta hay jesay hr nwda ayk had kay baray main malwmat mhafwza krta haay۔ ayk tabkha kay drkht ko ayk srny par mtadd rynj kay swalat ko mwsar andaza main jwab denay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ ayk tabkha ka drkht hamain ajazat dyta haay۔ksy ansar ya anasar ki pori rynj ki jghha la kar is main trmym kryn۔mkhtlf ksm ki malwmat ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye jesay had sy zayada sy zayada ، rynj sm ، rynj XOR ، wghyrha۔wha dayta ko bazayaft karnay ya is main trmym karnay kay liye drkar dask tak rsaiy ki tadad ko kam sy kam karnay kay liye dayzaain kyay gaye hain ، js sy woh un ayply kyshnza main astamal kay l well mnasb hain jn main bray mkdar main dayta tak tyza rftar rsaiy ki zurwrt hawty haay۔tabkha kay drkhtwn ko rynj kay astfsar kay msail ko hal karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay jesay kesi had main kam sy kam ، zayada sy zayada ، ya anasar ki rkm tlash krna۔an ka astamal rynj ap dayt kay msail ko hal karnay kay liye bhi kya jaskta hay jesay tamam anasar ko ayk niy kdr main ap dayt krna۔

Question: fynwk drkht kya haay؟
Answer: ayk fynwk drkht ، jsay bainry andayksda try (BIT) bhi kaha jata hay ، ayk drkht par mbny dayta dahanchha hay jo ayk saf main mtadd rynj kay swalat ko mwsar andaza main jwab denay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔as sy hamain kesi ansar ya alamty wkt main kesi ansar ki jghha la kar saf main trmym karnay ki ajazat mlty haay۔ayk fynwk drkht ko aam tawr par ayk saf kay tawr par nafza kya jata hay aur addy chabyan kay tkrawn ka astamal karty hoey is ki trtyb di jati haay۔yha antyjr kyza rynj [1 ... n] main ghrty hain ، 0. askypngh 0.mtalkha fynwk drkht ki jra par ayk mzumr nwda 0 kay sath nwdas hayn۔drkht ki hr staha main nwdas hawtay hain jn main asharywn kay sath 2 ki alag alag taaktwn ki rkm hawty hay (0 khaly rkm 0 ki nmaindghy karnay kay sath)۔dyiay gaye nwda kay waldyn ko is kay andayks main aakhry syt bt (ayl ays by) saaf krkay paya jaskta hay ، jo is ki rkm main 2 ki sab sy chhwty taakt kay mtaabk haay۔fynwk try zayada tr astamal hawta hay jab hamain ayk saf di hogi hay aur hamain mtadd bar ya////awr hamain kiy bar anasar ki rkm tlash karnay ki zurwrt hay ، aur hamain is ki bhi zurwrt hay keh hamain mtadd bar anasar ka mjmwaha tlash karnay ki zurwrt haay۔ksy bhi khasa andayks ki kymt ko ap dayt karnay kay liye mtadd ap dayt aapryshn anjam dyn۔fynwk try astamal aur kwda aasan hay ، khasa tawr par ksayr jhaty safwn ki sawrt myn۔tabkha kay drkht kay aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay kay mkablay main ، fynwk try kam jghha astamal krta hay aur is par aml draamd aasan haay۔fynwk try ka ayk nksaan yeh hay keh isy sirf ayk aapryshn kay sath astamal kya jaskta hay jo alta haay۔msaal kay tawr par ، is kay alawha ayk alt aybl aapryshn haay: agar A + B = C phir C - A = B (jhaan - azuafay kay alta kay tawr par kam krta haay)

zayada mkhtlf hawtay hain tou ، is praprty ko bhaal karnay kay liye twazan pyda kya jata haay۔aay wy ayl kay drkhtwn ka nam un kay mwjdwn aydaylsn wylsky aur lyndas kay nam par rakha gaya haay۔yhaan Question: ayk lahakha srny kya haay؟
Answer: ayk lahakha srny dyiay gaye tar kay tamam lahakha ka ayk trtyb shuda saf haay۔yha ayk dayta dahanchha hay jo tar main zayly zakhyrwn ko astwr karnay aur tlash karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔taryf ayk lahakha drkht ki tarah hay ، jo dyiay gaye mtn kay tamam lahakha ki ayk kmprysda sha rkhy haay۔ksy bhi lahakha drkht par mbny alghwrthm ko alghwrthm kay sath tbdyl kya jaskta hay jo azuafy malwmat kay sath braha hoa lahakha srny astamal krta hay aur isi msilay ko isi wkt ki pychydghy main hal krta haay۔lahakha drkht kay day ayf ays trawrsl krkay lahakha drkht sy lahakha srny tamyr ki jaskty haay۔dr hakykt ، ayk lahakha srny aur lahakha drkht dono lkyry wkt main ayk dusray sy tamyr kya jaskta haay۔lahakha srny bohat sary strngh sy mtalk msail ko hal karnay main mdd krta hay jesay pytrn mmasal ، tlash ki tlash ، aur sab sy tawyl bar bar hony wali sbstrngh tlash krna۔bhat sari ayply kyshnza ، jesay dayta bys ، mrtb karnay waly ، aur aaprytngh sstm main lahakha srnywn ka astamal kya jata haay۔wha dayta ko bazayaft karnay ya is main trmym karnay kay liye drkar mwazanha ki tadad ko kam sy kam karnay kay liye dayzaain kyay gaye hain ، js sy woh un ayply kyshnza main astamal kay l well mnasb hain jn main bray mkdar main dayta tak tyzay sy rsaiy ki zurwrt hawty haay۔

Question: ayk naghwar syt dayta dahanchha kya haay؟
Answer: ayk naghwar syt dayta dahanchha ، jsay ywnyn ft dayta dahanchha ya anzumam ki tlash kay syt kay nam sy bhi jana jata hay ، ayk dayta dahanchha hay jo das daysynt (ghyr awwrlypngh) sytwn ka mjmwaha mhafwza krta haay۔yha niay sytwn ko shaml karnay ، sytwn ko zum karnay (an ki ywnyn kay zaryaha un ki jghha lynay) ، aur kesi syt ka nmaindha mmbr tlash karnay kay liye karwaiyan fraham krta haay۔ksy ghraf kay kam sy kam phylay hoey drkht ko tlash karnay kay liye krskl kay alghwrthm main mtnazaaha aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay klydy krdar ada karty hayn۔km sy kam phyla hoa drkhtwn ki ahamyt ka mtalb yeh hay keh aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay ko alag alag alghwrthm ki wsya aksam ka samna karna prata haay۔as kay alawha ، naghwar syt dayta dahanchay main alamty ghnty kay sath sath mrtb karnay walon main bhi ، khasa tawr par rjstr mkhtsa karnay kay msail kay l applications ayply kyshnza bhi mwjwd hayn۔ayk naghwar syt ayk dayta dahanchha hay jo anasar ki kainat sy bakhbr rhata haay۔aaitmza ko mtadd naghwar (ghyr awwrlypngh) sytwn main tksym kya jata haay۔naghwar syt dayta dahanchha mndrjha zayl karrwaiywn ki hamayt krta haay: napsndydha syt main niay syt shaml krna۔syt dayta dahanchay bohat sy ayply kyshnza main astamal hawtay hain ، jesay dayta bys ، mrtb karnay waly ، aur aaprytngh sstm۔wha dayta ko bazayaft karnay ya is main trmym karnay kay liye drkar mwazanha ki tadad ko kam sy kam karnay kay liye dayzaain kyay gaye hain ، js sy woh un ayply kyshnza main astamal kay l well mnasb hain jn main dayta ki bray mkdar main tyza rftar rsaiy ki zurwrt hawty haay۔

Question: askyp lst kya haay؟
Answer: askyp lst ayk amkany aadad wa shmar ka dahanchha hay jo lnkda fharstwn kay drjha bndy ki mdd sy aaitmza ki trtyb shuda fharst ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jo aaitmza kay brahtay hoey wyrl wyrl kay bad kay hasawl ko jwrata haay۔yha ayk mwsar andaza main aaitm ki tlash kay aml ki ajazat dyta haay۔askyp lst mnslk fharst ka ayk twsya shuda wrzen haay۔yha saarf ko bohat jld ansar ko tlash ، hatanay aur dakhl karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔as main ayk bys lst par mushtamil hay js main anasar ka ayk mjmwaha shaml hay jo bad kay anasar kay lnk drjha bndy ko brkrar rkhta haay۔askyp lst prtwn main bny hui hay ، js main nechay ki prt ayk aam aardarda mnslk fharst haay۔har aaly prt nechay di hogi fharstwn kay liye "ayksprys lyn" kay tawr par kam krty hay ، jahan prt main ayk ansar main prt I+1 main kuch mkrrha amkan kay sath zaahar hawta haay۔awstaa ، hr ansar lagh ayn ki fharstwn main zaahar hawta hay ، aur sab sy lmba ansar (aam tawr par askyp lst kay samnay ka ayk khasa ansar) tamam fharstwn main zaahar hawta haay۔askyp lstwn ko amly jamha phananay main nsbta easy aasan hay ، khasa tawr par jab mtwazan drkhtwn jesay AVL drkhtwn ya srkh syaha drkhtwn kay mkablay myn۔wha bay trtyb nmbr jnrytr sy mshwrha krkay mtwazan hain ، jo is bat ka tayn krta hay keh nwda ki staha ko nwda ki staha kay nam sy paiay janay waly nwda kay pas ktnay pwaintr kehty hayn۔askyp lstyn bohat sy ayply kyshnza main astamal ki jati hain ، jesay dayta bys ، mrtb karnay waly ، aur aaprytngh sstm۔wha dayta ko bazayaft karnay ya is main trmym karnay kay liye drkar mwazanha ki tadad ko kam sy kam karnay kay liye dayzaain kyay gaye hain ، js sy woh un ayply kyshnza main astamal kay l well mnasb hain jn main bray mkdar main dayta tak tyza rftar rsaiy ki zurwrt hawty haay۔

Question: khud twazan bainry tlash ka drkht kya haay؟
Answer: khud twazan bainry srch ka drkht ayk bainry srch try hay jo khud bkhwd apni awnchaiy ko sawabdydy shay kay azuafay aur hazaf karnay kay aalm main rkhta haay۔yha ayk nwda par mbny bainry srch try hay js main drkht ki awnchaiy main brahty hui drkht ki awnchaiy kay khlaf ahatyatay akdamat shaml hain ، takha yeh tjrydy aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay "khwd twazan" ko wsaf haasal kryn۔bainry srch try par zayada tr aapryshn drkht ki awnchaiy kay liye braha rast mtnasb wkt lghatay hain ، lhazaa awnchaiy ko chhwta rkhna zurwry haay۔awnchaiy H kay sath ayk bainry drkht zayada sy zayada 2^(H+1) -1 nwdas par mushtamil hawskta haay۔khwd twazan bainry tlash kay drkht atprywrty trtyb shuda fharstwn kay liye mwsar nfaza fraham karty hain ، aur dusray tjrydy aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay jesay ayswsy aytyw arywn ، trjyhay ktaaryn aur sytwn kay liye astamal hawsktay hayn۔khwd twazan bainry tlash kay drkhtwn ki mtadd aksam hain ، jesay aay wy ayl kay drkht ، srkh syaha drkht ، chhraknay waly drkht aur tryps۔yha drkht hamyshha apni awnchaiy ko kam sy kam rkhtay hain ، is bat ko ykyny bnatay hoey keh un kay kam hamyshha O (lagh ayn) ki bdtryn kymt ko brkrar rakhien ghay۔khwd twazan bainry tlash kay drkht bohat sy ayply kyshnza ، jesay dayta bys ، mrtb karnay waly ، aur aaprytngh sstm main astamal hawtay hayn۔wha dayta ko bazayaft karnay ya is main trmym karnay kay liye drkar mwazanha ki tadad ko kam sy kam karnay kay liye dayzaain kyay gaye hain ، js sy woh un ayply kyshnza main astamal kay l well mnasb hain jn main bray mkdar main dayta tak tyzay sy rsaiy ki zurwrt hawty haay۔

Question: dwghna mnslk fharst kya haay؟
Answer: ayk dwghna lnkda fharst ayk ksm ki mnslk fharst hay js main hr nwda main tyn ajzaaa hawtay hayn: dayta ، pchhlay nwda ka ayk pwaintr ، aur aghlay nwda ka ayk pwaintr۔yha ayk lkyry dayta dahanchha hay jo ajtmaay tawr par aadad wa shmar ki trtyb ki nmaindghy krta hay js main hr nwda kay tyn hasaay hawtay hayn۔phalay nwda ka pchhla pwaintr aur aakhry nwda kay aghlay pwaintr main hamyshha hr smt main akhttam ki nshandhay hawty haay۔ayk dwghna mnslk fharst aaghay aur psmandha dono smtwn main nywyghyshn ki ajazat dyty hay ، js sy yeh ayk wahad mnslk fharst sy zayada lchkdar bn jata haay۔yha bohat sy ayply kyshnza main astamal hawta hay ، jesay dayta bys ، mrtb karnay waly ، aur aaprytngh sstm۔dwghna mnslk fharst kay fwaid main mstkl wkt dakhl karnay aur anasar ko hazaf karnay kay sath sath dono smtwn main fharst ko abwr karnay ki salahayt bhi shaml haay۔nksaanat main pchhlay pwaintr kay liye drkar azuafy jghha aur ayk wahad mnslk fharst kay mkablay main aml draamd ki pychydghy shaml haay۔mjmway tawr par ، ayk dwghna lnkda fharst un haalat kay liye ayk mfyd dayta dahanchha hay jahan bar bar andraj aur anasar ko hazaf karnay ki zurwrt hawty hay ، aur jahan dono smtwn main trawrsl zurwry haay۔

Question: ayk srklr mnslk fharst kya haay؟
Answer: ayk srklr mnslk fharst ayk ksm ki mnslk fharst hay js main tamam nwdas dairay ki tshkyl kay liye jraay hoey hayn۔rwayty mnslk fharst kay braks ، fharst kay aakhr main koi kaladm nahin haay۔as kay bjaiay ، aakhry nwda pehlay nwda ki taraf asharha krta hay ، js sy ayk srklr dahanchha pyda hawta haay۔srklr sy mnslk fharstwn ko aam tawr par ayk wahad mnslk fharst kay dayta dahanchay ka astamal karty hoey nafza kya jata hay ، jahan fharst main hr nwda aghlay nwda sy ayk pwaintr kay zaryaha mnslk hawta haay۔as fharst main aakhry nwda phir pehlay nwda sy mnslk hawta hay ، js sy rngh nma dahanchha tshkyl hawta haay۔srklr mnslk fharstwn ki do aksam hayn: akylay lnkda aur dwghna lnkda۔ayk wahad mnslk srklr lnkda fharst main ، hr nwda main ayk pwaintr hawta hay jo fharst main aghlay nwda ki taraf asharha krta haay۔dwghna mnslk srklr lnkda fharst main ، hr nwda main ayk pwaintr hawta hay jo fharst main aghlay aur pchhlay dono nwdas ki taraf asharha krta haay۔ srklr lnkda fharstyn aysy sawrthaal main karaamd hain jahan aadad wa shmar ko mstkl lwp main karrwaiy karnay ki zurwrt hay ، jesay hakykt myn۔wkt ki drkhwastyn ya nkaly۔wha mlty plyir ghymza main bhi astamal hawtay hain ، jahan tamam khlaraywn ko srklr lnkda lst farm main trtyb diya jata haay۔srklr sy mnslk fharst kay fwaid main fharst kay akhttam par nzar rkhnay kay baghair pori fharst ko abwr karnay ki salahayt ، aur fharst main kesi bhi nwda sy kesi bhi nwda par janay ki salahayt shaml haay۔nksaanat main ayk wahad mnslk fharst kay mkablay main aml draamd ki pychydghy ، aur lamhadwd lwp main janay ka amkan shaml hay jabky fharst ko abwr karty hoey agar lwp ko sahayha tarykay sy nahin twraa gaya haay۔

Question: ayk wahad mnslk fharst kya haay؟
Answer: ayk wahad mnslk fharst ayk lkyry dayta dahanchha hay js main anasar mtzuad mymwry kay mkamat par mhafwza nahin hawtay hain aur hr ansar sirf ayk pwaintr ka astamal karty hoey is kay aghlay ansar sy mnslk hawta haay۔yha ayk ksm ki mnslk fharst hay jo ghair mstkym hay ، is ka mtalb hay keh isy sr sy aakhry nwda (dm) tak sirf ayk hi smt main mntkl kya jaskta haay۔mnslk fharst main hr ansar ko nwda kaha jata haay۔ayk hi nwda main dayta aur aghlay nwda ka pwaintr hawta hay jo fharst ki sakht ko brkrar rkhnay main mdd krta haay۔phalay nwda ko sr kaha jata haay۔yha fharst kay pehlay nwda ki taraf asharha krta hay aur fharst main hr dusray ansar tak rsaiy main hamari mdd krta haay۔aakhry nwda ، jsay kabhi kabhi dm bhi kaha jata hay ، nwl ki taraf asharha krta hay jo fharst kay akhttam par is bat ka tayn karnay main hamari mdd krta haay۔akylay mnslk fharstyn aadad wa shmar ko sirf ayk tarah sy abwr karnay ki ajazat dyty hayn۔akylay lnkda fharstyn bohat sy ayply kyshnza main astamal ki jati hain ، jesay dayta bys ، mrtb karnay waly ، aur aaprytngh sstm۔wha dayta ko bazayaft karnay ya is main trmym karnay kay liye drkar mwazanha ki tadad ko kam sy kam karnay kay liye dayzaain kyay gaye hain ، js sy woh un ayply kyshnza main astamal kay l well mnasb hain jn main bray mkdar main dayta tak tyza rftar rsaiy ki zurwrt hawty haay۔kchh aam karwaiyan jo akylay mnslk fharstwn par anjam di jaskty hain un main andraj ، hazaf karna ، aur ayk mkhsawsa nwda ki tlash karna shaml haay۔

Question: thwraa sa saf kya haay؟
Answer: thwraa sa srny ، jsay bt myp ، bt syt ، bt strngh ، ya bt wyktr bhi kaha jata hay ، ayk dayta dahanchha hay jo ayk saf ki shkl main bwlyn akdar ya bts ko kmpykt tawr par astwr krta haay۔bts sirf 0 ya 1 hawsktay hayn۔bt srny main hr ayk aazaad hay ، aur chwnkha hr ayk main 2 akdar hawsktay hain ، yeh 2^n akdar ki nmaindghy krskta hay jahan N saf main bts ki tadad haay۔thwraa sa srny syt {0 ، 1} main akdar kay l some kuch dawmyn (tkryba hamyshha addywn ki ayk rynj) ki nkshha sazay haay۔akdar ko taryk/rwshny ، ghair haazur/mwjwd ، mkfl/ghyr mkfl ، drst/ghlta ، aur isi tarah ki trjmany ki jaskty haay۔an ki kmpyktyns ki wjha sy ، bt srnywn main un alakwn main mtadd drkhwastyn hain jahan jghha ya karkrdghy ayk prymym main haay۔aam tawr par ، woh ayk sadha syt dayta dahanchay ko nafza karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔bt sray tyzay sy aapryshn karnay kay liye haarda wyir main bt lywl ki hum aahanghy ka asthasaal karnay main mwsar hayn۔wha bohat sy ayply kyshnza main astamal hawtay hain ، jesay dayta bys ، mrtb karnay waly ، aur aaprytngh sstm۔jawa main ، thwraa sa srny ki nmaindghy btsyt klas kay zaryaha ki jati hay ، aur C ++ main ، thwraa sa srny btyray klas ka astamal karty hoey nafza kya jata haay۔

Question: bainry andayksda drkht kya haay؟
Answer: ayk bainry asharyha dar drkht ، jsay fynwk try kay nam sy bhi jana jata hay ، ayk dayta dahanchha hay jo aadad ki ayk saf par sabkha rkm kay swalat ko mwsar andaza main jwab denay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha hamain O (lagh ayn) taim pychydghy main ayk saf kay sabkha mjmwaha ka hasab lghanay ki ajazat dyta haay۔bainry andayksda drkht ki nmaindghy ayk saf kay tawr par ki jati hay ، jahan hr nwda un pt srny kay kuch anasar ka mjmwaha rkhta haay۔bainry andayksda drkht ka saiza un pt srny kay saiza kay brabr haay۔bainry asharyha dar drkht drkht main mwjwd tamam akdar ko 0 kay tawr par shrwa krkay tamyr kya gaya hay ، aur phir tamam asharyha jat kay liye ap dayt () fnkshn ko kal kryn۔ap dayt () aapryshn bainry andayksda try ko aar aar [andayks] += wyl anjam dy kar ap dayt krta hay ، jahan aay aar aar un pt srny haay۔bainry asharyha dar drkht ko had sy mtalk swalat anjam denay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، jesay andayks ki ayk had main anasar ki rkm tlash krna۔bainry andayksda drkht bohat sy ayply kyshnza main astamal hawta hay ، jesay dayta bys ، mrtb karnay waly ، aur aaprytngh sstm۔yha dayta ko bazayaft ya trmym karnay kay liye drkar mwazanha ki tadad ko kam sy kam karnay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya hay ، js sy yeh ayply kyshnza main astamal kay l well mnasb hay js main bray mkdar main dayta tak tyza rsaiy ki zurwrt hawty haay۔

Question: ayk wyrl tybl kya haay؟
Answer: ayk wyrl tybl ayk aadad wa shmar ka dahanchha hay jo nsbta fast tyza aur mwsar andaza main jamd rynj kay swalat ka jwab denay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jesay rynj kam sy kam astfsar (RMQ)۔yha dusray dayta dahanchay kay mkablay main is kay tyza astfsar aur mkhtsar nfaza kay liye phachana jata haay۔ayk wyrl tybl ka bnyady khyal yeh hay keh do lmbaiy ki taakt kay sath rynj swalat kay liye tamam jwabat ko pehlay sy tay .n karna haay۔jb hum kesi wyrl tybl par rynj kay astfsar ka jwab dytay hain tou ، hum pehlay isy pawr aaf tw do zayly hadwd main tksym krsktay hayn۔as kay bad ، hum pehlay sy mwjwd jwabat ko tlash karty hain aur inhain apnay aakhry jwab main jwra dytay hayn۔wyrl tybl bohat sy ayply kyshnza main astamal hawta hay ، jesay dayta bys ، mrtb karnay waly ، aur aaprytngh sstm۔yha dayta ko bazayaft karnay ya is main trmym karnay kay liye drkar mwazanha ki tadad ko kam sy kam karnay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya hay ، js sy yeh ayply kyshnza main astamal kay l well mnasb hay js main bray mkdar main dayta tak tyza rftar rsaiy ki zurwrt hawty haay۔kchh aam karwaiyan jo kesi wyrl tybl par anjam di jaskty hain un main tamyr ، pyshghy ، aur had sy mtalk swalat shaml hayn۔wyrl tybl ko kam sy kam swalat (RMQ) main astamal kya jata hay ، jahan yeh O (1) wkt main jwab ki ghnty krskta haay۔taham ، yeh nakabl tskhyr safwn par rynj kay swalat kay l better bhatr hay ، jahan srny kay aadad wa shmar ko do swalat kay darmiyan tbdyl nahin kya jaskta۔
